reviews.text: We were stuck in the mountains when our fuel line went out in our truck on a Sunday- on a holiday weekend!!   We called Winterton towing from a referral from a friend, and man, they were right!  From the phone call, to the drop off … we felt at ease and taken care of!  Scott dropped off our truck at the shop and was so pleasant and professional. We will continue to praise and share this experience …   Thank you!

reviews.name: Nelle Pugsley
reviews.text: Very responsive and helpful🤗 The phone was answered by a real person and they said they could be there within thirty minutes. Thanks so much for the great service!

reviews.name: ttynsk
reviews.text: They answered the phone right away. Let me know it would be possibly 45 min for them to get someone to my car. They were able to get to it much sooner. Great communication with Andrew. He was very polite and prompt. Got the car were it needed to be in a timely manner. Will definitely recommend Winterton. All around great experience.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much for the great review and recommendation!

reviews.name: Steven Brewer
reviews.text: Great service! My truck broke down this morning I gave them a call they arrived right when they said they would. Very affordable price too! I’m saving there number in my phone for future reference
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much Steven for the 5 star review! Glad we could help.  Thanks for calling and if you ever need us again don't hesitate to call! Nice meeting you today!

reviews.name: Alyssa Garrison
reviews.text: Andrew was so awesome! He was very nice and fluent in my stressful time. I called early morning hours and he picked up the phone immediately. After I told him the problem he was grabbing his keys and was out the door. He even got to me before my ride did! Exceptional customer service. Wonderful rates as well! Hopefully I won’t need a tow again but if I do he’s always going to be my first call.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for the great review! Glad we could help in your stressful situation this morning! If you ever need a tow again we'll be here! Good luck and hopefully they get your car figured out at the shop.

reviews.name: Joe Detro
reviews.text: From the very first phone call till the end,the service was outstanding. I got stranded in Idaho on my way home. My truck broke down while towing my trailer. I called Ams towing and Angie was very kind, helpful, fast and efficient. Then within minutes Evan the driver called to say he was on his way. Evan was awesome and very professional. If you need a tow call AMS. Thanks again AMS

reviews.name: Finis Thomas
reviews.text:
Excellent Excellent Excellent!!!
The driver was very good at his job, his boss was on the phone with us every step of the way. Would definitely use this service again. 5 stars is not enough I'd give them 20. Thanks again for your help...

reviews.name: Nathaniel Foster
reviews.text: Car broke down 3 miles from my home. Evan in truck #34 got to me in a 1/4 the time the guy on the phone said it would take, got my car up onto the truck in like two minutes and got it to my house in another 7. Extremely friendly, extremely kind and understanding, and extremely competent, for quite a decent rate as well. If you ever need towing from AMS, ask for Evan if you can. Great service and if all their drivers are like this then I'd highly recommend them.

reviews.name: Lisa Lee
reviews.text: Absolute misrepresentation of price on the phone!  Talk about kick you when your down.  Went from $292.00 quote to $$497.86 and min tip of 75.00 expected!!   And what do you do then?  What if I didn't have the money?  Would they keep my cat?  Was price doubled because of the car I drive??  Curious???

reviews.name: J Slick
reviews.text: Great service. My trailer clearance lights were both out. Driver side went out next morning but its a separate issue going on because they took pictures with both of them working before they left. I called and the guy that answered the phone was professional in response and even helped out over the phone with a few tips.

reviews.name: NORTH LOGISTICS COMPANY
reviews.text:
Our truck broke down due to a transmission issue, and we called this towing service for assistance. Their driver arrived and disassembled the driveshaft (cardan). I’m not entirely sure whether that was necessary for towing, but I assumed it was part of the standard procedure.

After towing the truck to the repair shop on a Saturday (which was closed until Monday), the driver left without reassembling the driveshaft. I called the company and asked them to send the driver back to complete the job. They responded that it would be handled by the shop’s mechanics instead.

I explained that if the mechanics were to reassemble the driveshaft, we would likely be charged for it — and this should have been the towing company’s responsibility. They then told me it was part of their policy. However, no one mentioned this to me when I booked the tow. When I raised this, the woman on the phone simply claimed she wasn’t the one who spoke to me during the booking — which was not true.

This lack of communication and accountability is disappointing. Customers deserve to be clearly informed about what is included in the service and what is not. Transparency is key in any business.

reviews.name: Dave Jervis
reviews.text: Attempted to get pricing for service, was told by the rude lady on the phone that 'we don't do that, thank yeeewwwwww" and then she hung up.  Unprofessional.

reviews.name: Shelley Cooper
reviews.text: I had an excellent experience with Stauffer’s Towing! Cassie was incredibly helpful and a pleasure to speak with over the phone. When we blew a tire on our Escalade, I called three other towing companies, and none had the flatbed necessary for our vehicle. Stauffer’s came through quickly and efficiently. They were not only fast but also very affordable, which was a nice surprise. I couldn't have asked for better service during a stressful situation. Highly recommend them!

reviews.name: Felipe Silva
reviews.text: Excellent service 👏.  Thank you for helping me today I called more then 5 towing companies around and no body wanted the opportunity. I appreciate your time and service. The lady that I spoke on the phone she is a sweet heart. I thank you and your team for helping me today with the skidsteer from sunbelt rentals.  In West Jordan.

reviews.name: Mike Mohr
reviews.text: Good equipment, courteous professional driver and prompt service only get you 2 stars when the bill was $425 to tow 10 miles. Also paperwork was a hassle. None given at the time of service and it took 2 begging phone calls to get it emailed.

reviews.name: William Jolley
reviews.text: They quickly picked me up and took my car to the dealership. It was already prepaid over the phone from the sweet office gal.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: William, we're glad you had such a positive experience with Empire Towing & Recovery! Thanks for the wonderful review and kind words about our office staff. We appreciate your business!

reviews.name: Laurie
reviews.text: Jeremy answered the phone and sent someone out very quickly to pick my my car. Glen showed called to tell me he was on the way and showed up before was expected. He was so helpful and explained a lot to me! Glad I used them to tow my car!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review. We look forward to serving you in the future.

reviews.name: Emir Alikadic
reviews.text:
Dispatcher answered phone instantly, and answered all my questions patiently. Standing in full motorcycle leathers on highway shoulder in 105F weather, I probably wasn't at my best, but the dispatcher certainly was - and I really appreciate that.

Glenn (the driver) called ahead to let me know he'll be ahead of schedule, communicated with me throughout, made sure my motorcycle was safely loaded and protected for the ride, and delivered it to destination promptly.

You're never having a good day when you need a towing company/roadside assistance, so it really makes a huge difference when the folks you're dealing with are professional and courteous, like Empire Towing.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much for your review. We really appreciate your business and I’m so glad that our staff exceeded your expectations.

reviews.name: Matt McDuffie
reviews.text: I need truck that broke down a few months ago towed to the mechanic the day before I was going to contact the tow company that my mechanic recommended I was outside Bestbuy in Draper in my car and that decided to stop working. I had to take Uber home then the next day I started calling I called the recommended company the guy sound like he was too busy and told me to call back. Then I called a few more companies one said he didn’t have a driver another guy said he wasn’t a tow company even though he answered the phone with the same name. When I finally called empire the guy Jeremy that answered was super nice I told him my truck was at my house in south jordan and the car in Draper he said not a problem but he would not be able to get to it fir about an hour and a half he quoted me the price for each vehicle which I tell you was very reasonable within 30 min he was at my house to pickup the truck unfortunately it had a flat tire and his tow truck was not able to move it but he would dispatch the one that  could without an additional charge. He went instead to pickup the car they had both vehicles to the mechanic within two hours. I highly recommend this company to anyone needing towing service very Proffesional five stars all the way.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much for your review. I’m glad we were able to help you with both of your vehicles. We appreciate your comprehensive review and would love to serve you again if needed.

reviews.name: Devin Sherwood
reviews.text: If I could give this company zero stars I would. My insurance company called them to tow my car, almost 2 hours goes by... Guess what no driver. My insurance called me and said they cancelled and marked the tow as complete. Completely  unprofessional.  I even called them to get an update on the location of my tow truck and nobody ever answered the phone. Thanks "Empire" for showing me what a good towing company is like. Nope not for me.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: We had cancelled the tow with your insurance company, we did not mark the tow as complete. That's not even how the process works.  I'm sorry that they didn't re-dispatch another provider in a timely manner, that is out of my control.

reviews.name: Travis Van Dongen
reviews.text:
Great experience with Cartow today.  My shop/van sees many miles.  Today it decided to stop working so well.  Cartow was super helpful.  Answered their phone, checked for proper fit of my van on their truck, called me back to coordinate the job.  And got my vehicle to repair shop safely.  Driver, Aaron, was friendly and professional.  Safe loading and unloading of my van.
Thank you.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for the great review Travis!

reviews.name: John Veloz
reviews.text: Horrible nasty individual answered the phone and spoke to my young nephew who was trying to get a quote.  She was Nasty to him and unpleasant.  Call was on speaker and he asked for a quote and she could not be bothered.  Put him on hold and just hung up on him.  I called back because I was upset at how she treated him and told her she was nasty.  She the proceeds to call me back from a blocked number only to tell me that she had my number.  Well good for her.  I didn't call from a blocked number.  I would not deal with this company.

reviews.name: S M
reviews.text:
I have saved Cartow in my phone. They deserve it. I've used them twice in a year and each time their dispatcher is so courteous and professional. The tow drivers have been so considerate and professional as well. This last time, SHAWN #44, helped my 18 yr old daughter tow her vehicle, she was so nervous about everything. He was professional and kind and made her feel important and respected. My daughter saved Cartow in her phone too.  I highly recommend Cartow. Thanks again! 🙏

And it was the fastest wait time I have experienced ever, especially right before Christmas.

reviews.name: Duvish Suthar
reviews.text: they towed my car the first time and everything was okay at first, the shop i towed it to took a video on their property for their safety reasons to cover them if they did any damage, and because of that when i needed another tow the lady on the phone told me they will no longer tow for me because they were “illegally recorded” even though it was on their property, and my car was apparently too low (bone stock civic suspension) would never use them again even for another car

reviews.name: SoshJam
reviews.text:
I was a bit frustrated when I left my first review but now that I've actually concluded business with them I thought I'd leave a real one.

When I called them initially, the person who answered my phone was very unengaged and didn't provide all the information I needed, and it took them three or four hours to call me back. Even then it was very difficult to find out what I had to do and when I had to do it.

They also painted some numbers on my windshield, probably as some internal way for them to track who the car belongs to or something. But they aren't coming off from regular scrubbing, and I might have to hire someone or something to get my windshield back to normal.

Other than those major hurdles though, it went fine. Once I was actually able to get down there and pick it up, it went very smoothly. The person at the desk at the impound lot was helpful. It was very expensive but that's not their fault as the rates are controlled by the state.

reviews.name: dude5576
reviews.text: Hey Paul I love your videos I wonder where I can get that radio and steering wheel that in wrecker  I love when help people from getting stuck too I had a very nice phone call with your mom  thank John from Jersey

reviews.name: Austin Stenholm
reviews.text: Called for a quote because sugar was put in my tank  and was rushed off the phone! He stated "they can't do big jobs like that". Apparently they can't change a fuel pump, filter, or injectors.  I can understand not being able to drop a gas tank. Plus I don't even need the work done I only needed a quote for the courts!

reviews.name: Sarah Camryn
reviews.text: This business will lie to you to get you to use their service. I was told I could call to release my vehicle to the auto body shop yet when I did that they changed their story saying I had to come down in person just trying to get it in their custody longer to rack up storage fees. They said they allow over the phone release for someone that got injured only. Considering the technology we have today and knowing people that just got in an accident don't have transportation Id say their service is awful. What a way to add more stress to an already stressful situation! Plus the last on the phone was rude as hell!

reviews.name: Maegan
reviews.text: Gary found my sisters car on Friday evening, over the phone with us after she broke down while visiting from out of town. He got to the car before the city towed it and was able to get it to a very good mechanic who got them back on the road, quickly the next day. He was extremely professional and responsive to our calls as we worked to figure out where she had left it. His invoice was very reasonable and we are so thankful for his quick response! Thank you, Gary!

reviews.name: MC Outis
reviews.text: These guys are awesome I had to get my car off private property before the place closed and I was at work and couldn't be there and they helped coordinate everything with me and took my card over the phone a day in advance but didnt charge til after the job was done. They were also the cheapest and least pushy out of all the other towing services I called..

reviews.name: Jenny Moran
reviews.text: Terrible service! I had to leave work to go home and help the tow guy with my husbands car because he apparently doesn't know how to tow a Tesla! Upon arrival I was told to get in the car and press the buttons he told me to press all for it to still not work and him forcing the Tesla on the tow bed anyways! After about 30 minutes of helping him figure out how to get the car on the bed I was told it would be another $50 that my "insurance refuses to pay" even though I had just gotten off the phone with our insurance and was told they would cover all costs. He refused to accept insurance payment and kept insisting I pay him $50 directly. What a scam and rip off go to someone else when you need a tow.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Such a liar why do I have to refuse?

reviews.name: Ahhnehh T
reviews.text: Had roadside assistance schedule this company, they were almost an hour late, no updates and would not answer their phone. Terrible experience.

reviews.name: Eddie Wilson
reviews.text: Zero star review! First and foremost, this is a difficult place to find due to it being tucked behind a bunch of semi truck businesses/building and other industrial machinery. To add to the level of difficulty the company office is even harder to find. I recommend calling the towing company for help. The owner of QR Towing LLC (Tomas) is a joke and he will not hear you out. Billing/reception team seem to be uneducated and do not know what is going on with your vehicle and payment. The girl that helped me was nice but lack customer service skills and basic social skills. The receptionist and I finish with my transaction and she didn’t give me an invoice/receipt or direction of my damaged vehicle to collect my belongings. Yet I had to ask her all those questions and she still was not sure of what answer to give me. In addition, she kept looking down and looking at her phone. In conclusion, this place is an absolute joke and every be safe out there, so you do not need to deal with people who are unprofessional and rude.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Eddie, we're very sorry to hear about your experience. We value our customers' feedback and are always looking to improve. Please contact us directly so we can discuss your concerns further.

reviews.name: Tavish Snow
reviews.text: My wife and I were on an adventure today for our 21st wedding anniversary, we were in the middle of the west desert on paved road  when our tire strut snapped after going over a set of horrible railroad tracks.  We got 5-6 other quotes, almost tried to rent a truck and do it our selves, but QR towing saved our day!  Our car was  90 miles 1-2hrs driving outside of where we live. Tom with QR towing is who we reached on our sixth price quote he was the best price by far.  Tom was professional and courteous on the phone and took our information and payment and was off to retrieve our car immediately.  In 4 1/2 hrs we have our car back Thank you Tom Best price, customer service and time.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Congratulations on your 21st wedding anniversary! We're so glad QR Towing could help save your anniversary adventure after encountering car trouble in the desert. We understand the stress of being stranded, and we appreciate you highlighting Tom's professionalism, courtesy, and efficient service, especially considering the distance involved.  Thank you for choosing QR Towing, and we wish you many more happy anniversaries!

reviews.name: Krystal Huntsman
reviews.text: After being stranded in the middle of the road by our insurance towing company. I called QR Towing to see if they could help. Tomas was super quick, respectful and understanding to not have any more damage to a Classic car with a broken tie rod. This company will be saved on everyone's phone in case of emergencies. Thank you for all your help!!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Hello Krystal and thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you have nothing but amazing things to say about our team at QR Towing LLC and that you'd trust us to help you in the future. Take care and have a great day!

reviews.name: Aj Broschinsky
reviews.text: Rude on the phone and hung up on me trying to find my car
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Hello. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Please, contact us directly so we can gather more information about this incident.

reviews.name: Shon Schoppe
reviews.text: Illegally towed my car, cant leave a message, never answer the phone. did call me back from sms and said they would check with the driver but it has been many hours and no call. Worthless, unprofessional and irresponsible company. I will be sending complaints to every city and state official that will listen and has governing power over these car thieves.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Hello Shon,
We apologize for any inconvenience that you experienced on our behalf. We do not do business this way. Unfortunately, even when we set out to not only meet but exceed expectations, circumstances can prevent success. We wish you and your family all the best.

reviews.name: Brock Warwick
reviews.text: As advertised. Adam answered the phone on the 2nd ring. Described how keys were locked in the car. He was there in less than 10 minutes with professional tools and knowledge to get the job done.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
We pride on being punctual at our job so thanks for the review Now responding to our reviews sometimes it takes awhile
Thanks

reviews.name: Carter Jensen
reviews.text: We tried multiple ways to get our vehicle out, they held our vehicle hostage for 3 weeks. The driver William drove my vehicle off the tow truck when there was no oil in the vehicle, the phone representative Dakota cussed us out over the phone. They are truly an unprofessional company.

reviews.name: Mariah Ergovich
reviews.text: Brandon Melendez is who helped me….nicest guy from the jump. I was on the phone actually, he just basically took the keys as he saw I was preoccupied. Did what had to be done and sat there I was done on the phone and then said I’m gonna go take care of this for you. I’ll call you shortly, i got a call in the morning from the tire place my car was already done they had all my info it was for sure a great experience.

reviews.name: Karen Banta
reviews.text: Brandon Melendez towed our truck to the dealership. Kept me updated via phone calls. He was very courteous, friendly, knowkedgable, educational and pleasant to work with from the start. Thank you.

reviews.name: Jill Taylor
reviews.text:
This is the absolute worst company I have ever worked with. We were in a dire situation and they were no help at all!!!
The lady that answers the phone has the worst customer service skills I have come across. She was very rude.   I will never deal with them again and would suggest you don’t!!!

reviews.name: Mike Loveless
reviews.text: Rude office personnel on the phone! Horrible communication! Drivers are not very knowledgeable nor friendly! All this company cares about is a dollar and heck with customer service. I recommend using any other tow company and avoid Ogden Auto towing at all costs!

reviews.name: Alex Miller
reviews.text:
The owner  is a rude person  . He started  to  cuss  once   he picked  up the  phone  The only reason  was  that  I  was calling  on Saturday  coz I know that  some  towings  work  on weekends and sometimes  24/7
I would  never call if I didn't  need some help  on the highway
So I recommend  not  to use this  service  and  this rude guy

reviews.name: Aaron Roberts
reviews.text: The dispatcher lied on the phone failed to show up  at the agreed time, even though I called ahead of time. Then lied again just kept saying the driver is on the way several times. So 7 hours later never actually did anything. The dispatcher just didn’t care. Should be Bollocks not Bullocks .

reviews.name: Julie Christiansen
reviews.text: I love how kind and detail oriented everyone at Wolford's is! When I went in for my quote they took the time to explain everything that would need to happen. I was so surprised when I got a phone call that they were finished because it was days before they had told me!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you, Julie!  We love it when we can deliver a car early to a customer.  Hopefully you won't need us anytime soon, but keep us in mind if you do.

reviews.name: Brandi Butler
reviews.text: Marvin was amazing showed up quickly and helped me out so much!! I’ve made sure I have saved his company’s number in my phone so that the next time I ever need help, I know who my tow truck driver in the red superhero cape will be!!!

reviews.name: Thành Triệu
reviews.text: My car's lower ball joint popped off and I was fortunate for Marvel Towing to towed my car by to my house. Jodey the phone operator was very professional and caring to make sure I was OK. Juan the driver was a really cool dude. We had a good conversation about cars (he's a car guy), so that help eased my stress during the moment a lot. He went extra to nicely put my car in the garage so I can work on it. Overall, Jodey and Juan are very professional and easy to work with. Heaven forbid me for having to call a towing company again, but if that were to happen, Marvel would be the one.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Good afternoon Thanh. Marvel Towing is pleased to hear Jodey was able to take your call and make sure you were ok. Then she sent Carlos out to save the day. Great team work to them both. Thank you very much for leaving a wonderful 5 stars review. We will be here anytime needed.

reviews.name: Larry Griffiths
reviews.text: TJ was my driver that was assigned to help me with my dead battery. He came within 35min of my phone call, what can I say, he was great, had me on my way within 5min., that so I could get to the dealership for a new battery!! Awesome job, TJ
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Hello Larry. Way to go TJ! We are glad he was there quickly and got you back onto the road in 5 minutes to get a new battery at the dealership. We appreciate you leaving him a 5 star review. Thank you!

reviews.name: Brianna Sanzenbacher
reviews.text: I put in a request through AAA to have my car looked at because it wouldn't start. Marvel towing called me within 5 minutes of placing the service request and the person who helped me on the phone was very nice and willing to listen. I explained I had to be to work by 2, and she told me she would get a driver there immediately even though they were busy.. Anthony showed up within 20 minutes. Anthony helped replace my battery, but he also fixed a few minor things that he didn't have to. He was such a huge help and also pointed out some things I could repair on my own for a low price. I really enjoyed having him service my car and would 100% use this towing service again. Thank you guys so much!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Hey there Brianna. Awesome team work Marvel Towing!  We are happy to know Amber was able to dispatch Anthony out to you in a timely manner, especially knowing your needing to get to work. Great job to Anthony assisting and always going above and beyond to help his customers. We love the fact that that you would 100% use us again. Thank you very much for the 5 stars!

reviews.name: Mike Miner
reviews.text:
These guys are always great!! I couldn't find anyone on my insurance plan who would come out to replace my 6-year old battery, then called around myself and couldn't find anyone!

Of course Marvel (McNeil's) came through and not only that, they arrived within an hour and the person on the phone (sorry I didn't get your name) was super-friendly and helpful.

TJ texted me to inform me how far away he was, and showed up with a smile before taking me through my options. He not only replaced the battery quickly but checked the alternator too. I can't believe how easy these guys are to deal with after all the phone calls to other places I made. Thanks for the peace of mind!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Good morning Mike. We are happy to know Amber with dispatch was able to answer your call and get TJ headed out your way. Then TJ was able to get that new battery installed and check your alternator too. Anytime Mike we will be here for you! Thank you for the 5 star review!

reviews.name: Sabine Altermatt
reviews.text: Our RV was stuck in the sand on a Friday evening and we called Casey. He picked up the phone and showed up 30 mins later and towed us out of the sand, was not complicated at all and we were really glad he made the time for us - even outside of normal business hours! Amazing people!!

reviews.name: Robert Parker
reviews.text: Says 24 hour service but the phone was disconnected when I called

reviews.name: April Cossette
reviews.text: Never even answered the phone...

companies.name: Last Chance Land and Livestock Inc

reviews.name: Craig G
reviews.text:
I'm pleased with the great price and fast service.
They gave me a reasonable rough estimate over the phone, told me when to bring it in and delivered my car on time.
The actual price was $50 less than the estimate.
Thank you!

companies.name: H&M Mobile Truck and Trailer Repair

reviews.name: Adam Wingate
reviews.text: Incredible experience beginning to end. They were professional on the phone, arrived at my car 20 minutes EARLIER than estimated, and took me to my preferred tire repair shop. Driver was professional and friendly. Can’t recommend enough!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Wow! Thank you for your amazing review!  We're thrilled to hear that you had an incredible experience from start to finish. Our team takes pride in providing professional, timely, and friendly service, and we're so glad we could exceed your expectations. We truly appreciate your recommendation and are always here if you ever need us again!

reviews.name: Caleb Larson
reviews.text:
We were assigned this towing company through our insurance. They accepted the job and price that insurance quoted. Then after accepting they tried to call us and up the price by $175. They claimed that because of traffic and distance that they had to up the price. We declined of course, and went with a different towing company, but they ended up costing us over an hour and a half of wasted time. They even lied to our insurance agent over the phone and said their truck was already on site when it never showed up. The other towing company we went with actually stuck to the agreed upon price and didn't try to scam us out of additional money on top. Very unprofessional scam-like behavior from 4 Wheel.

Response to Owner: The destination of the tow is on the ticket when you accepted. So you knew the destination beforehand and accepted anyway. That is not our fault, so you did in fact waste out time. If you hadn't accepted a tow that you knew you couldn't complete, then a different company could have accepted that was actually able to complete the tow without up charging us $175. No responsibility taken, very disappointing.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Hello Mr. Larson, 

We are sorry to hear that your insurance was not clear with you from the beginning. As for the service itself sadly we do not cover Lehi which is where the vehicle was going to so we have our rates for going out of our area as is not something we normally cover. We understand everyone has different pricing and not everyone can use our services, but we did let the insurance know before hand so it was their mistake for not explaining to you and your wife the situation properly. We also used our time to send a driver even when he was cancelled half way through and our dispatchers calling as well so you were not the only one that loss time.  
Again we are really sorry your insurance was not profesionall enough to explain you everything like they should, but we are glad you made it safe. 

Have a great day.

reviews.name: Edie
reviews.text: I was towed by Diego, he was so friendly, helpful, and professional. Angie was an angel on the phone and kept me updated with when the tow truck would arrive. I would absolutely call them again if i was in need. Thank you all for your help!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us! We’re thrilled to hear that Diego and Angie were able to make a challenging situation a little easier with their friendly, helpful, and professional service. We truly appreciate your kind words and look forward to being there whenever you need us again. 
Please don't hesitate to contact us if you need assistance in the future.

reviews.name: Mac
reviews.text:
THIS COMPANY WILL NOT HONOR DAMAGES DONE TO YOUR VEHICLE STAY FAR AWAY!!!!

Saturday evening, the 13th, 4 Wheel Towing towed my car to the dealership after a coolant leak.

Not only was the drive miserable, since the operator giving us a ride was constantly on his phone while driving and swerving out of his lane, but when we made it to the dealership, he CRASHED MY CAR...

During the unloading my car, the operator had to readjust the bed. But when he raised it back up, he didn’t realize he’d forgotten to reengage the safety catch. My car rolled forward and crashed into the front of the trailer. Cracking my brand new $1200 carbon front lip.

He did call and report it back to the dispatcher, but I never heard anything back.  He told me the dispatcher would call me.  He apologized multiple times and admitted fault.  When I called the company myself, since he only spoke spanish, I was told that they'd have BMW inspect the damage and provide a recommendation.

The crack itself is fairly small, however it’s cracked carbon and not scratched, so it can’t be repaired.  Luckily the tow hook was still connected to the front bumper so it protected the majority of the bumper from damage.  However the lip protrudes past the hook, which collided with the trailer hard enough to dent the trailer (pictured).  So, it's obvious that the collision happened and was hard enough to dent steel.

After review with the service department, who recommended replacing the broken part, 4 Wheel Towing is now denying the claim and insisting the incident didn’t happen.

This is unacceptable for a professional towing operation and I’m hoping maybe this review will reach someone who cares enough to make this right as I now have to spend $1200 to replace the lip they broke. I'm completely stumped and feel helpless because they went AGAINST the dealership's recommendation and decided to straight up lie.  It's truly unbelievable, and I don't know what else to do but leave this review to hold them accountable...
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Hello Mr. Butler, 

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and frustration you've experienced. We take all claims of damages very seriously and strive to provide the best service possible.

We have thoroughly reviewed the incident reported on Saturday evening, the 13th, and conducted an extensive investigation in collaboration with BMW of Murray, BMW of North America, Urgently Roadside Assistance, and our claims department. After careful evaluation, it was concluded that we are not liable for the damages to your vehicle.

The conclusions were based on the following findings:

While you mentioned the operator was on his phone and swerving, our internal review and GPS tracking did not indicate any unsafe driving behaviors during the transport. However, we will reinforce our safety protocols with all operators to prevent any such concerns in the future.

Upon inspection of the damage to your vehicle and the truck, it was determined that the damage to your car's carbon lip was not consistent with the reported unloading process. The investigation found that the damage was likely pre-existing or occurred under different circumstances.

Our claims department denied the claim based on the findings mentioned above, after receiving input from all parties involved, BMW of Murray, BMW of North America and Urgently Roadside Assistance they also came to the same conclusion and have denied the claim as well after they received both yours and our evidence.

Additionally, we have noticed that several reviews have been posted on our Google page regarding this matter. While we value all feedback, it's important to note that Google has flagged and removed some of these reviews as they did not align with their policies. We encourage honest and constructive feedback, and we are committed to resolving any genuine concerns our customers may have.

We understand this situation is frustrating, and we regret that our conclusions do not align with your expectations. We always aim to address customer concerns promptly and fairly and again  we apologize for any distress this matter has caused and hope for your understanding.

Best regards,
4 WHEEL TOWING LLC

reviews.name: Emerance Rugaba
reviews.text: The lady on phone was good customer service the truck drive was super helpful l charged more because of holiday but l really appreciated that since other towing companies were available but you guys helped me out.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We're glad to hear that our team was helpful. We appreciate your understanding. 
If you ever need help again or have any further comments, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're here for you.

reviews.name: Alexis Harrington
reviews.text: They were quick to answer the phone and quick to get to my vehicle. The guy was very nice and careful with my car. I appreciated them taking care of me in a bind
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for the recommendation, Alexis Harrington! We are glad to see that your experience with our services was excellent. See you again!

reviews.name: Jae Gregory
reviews.text:
Developed brake noise while traveling and contact Larry here.  Very helpful over the phone, and I stopped in for what I expected would be new front brakes.  He was extremely pleasant from the first minute, and immediately scrambled under my truck to check out all 4 brakes.

Turns out they were all in good condition.  Larry took the time to explain brake pad ratings to me, and then share great info on the local area.  He even referred me to "Glazed and Grilled" where I had a fabulous $9 salad bar.  Thanks guys, you're the best!!!!!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for sharing your experince at Advanced Towing and Auto with us, Jae! We are thrilled that we were able to assist with your brakes and answer any questions that you had. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions, we look forward to working with you again the next time you need auto repairs!

reviews.name: Frank Gagnon
reviews.text:
There’s nothing pleasant about getting your car towed. It normally means you have major automotive problems, which equals a high service bill.

The fuel pump in my car gave out in Naples. The car won’t start. I’m stranded. I called every tow service in the Vernal area.

Not only was the service $62 less than the nearest competition, the service provided was awesome.

Tiffany took my phone call. I spoke to her on two occasions. Always courteous and friendly.

Dawn took my phone call on another occasion. I will assume Tiffany was on a break. Dawn was equally as courteous and friendly.

My tow truck driver showed up in a timely manner. His name is Bill and he moved to Vernal in 1973. By the speed he works, you’d think he was 25 years younger. This man, is pleasant and proud to serve the citizens of Vernal. I just spent 45 minutes enjoying conversation with this perfect stranger and it relieved me of this astronomical service-bill I will pay over the weekend.

What I will face in automotive bills was truly made a little better by Bill.

After my car was dropped off, I called Advanced and ask to speak to the owners. Not to complain, but praise. Mark, without haste, accepted my call. He was receptive and caring. He runs a top-notch company. And, by the way his employees respond to customer needs, he DOES care and has instilled a culture that carries through to the employees.

Look...I hate having to pay this service bill, but because of the service I received today, makes it a little easier to swallow.

Mark...buy this folks lunch!

John Wampler
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
John, it was our pleasure to serve you and my team and I can't thank you enough for the kind words!  And yes, I told everyone I would be buying them lunch on Friday for the outstanding job they did!  Thank you again!
Mark

reviews.name: Tysen Gehring
reviews.text:
Absolutely amazing. With the highway closed into Heber and a three hour backup, our rented Dodge Ram had an electronic failure and went into park on the highway while we were traveling at 55 mph and the system would not release from park. We were stuck in the right lane on a curve with minimal phone service.

Enterprise roadside assistance was pretty much useless and they didn’t send a tow truck after we requested several times since they considered our situation unsafe. Highway patrol was all tied up trying to re-open the road to Heber so we were stranded for a few hours until we found Heber Valley.

I called Heber Valley and Doug walked me through using the manual release cable behind the dash over the phone to get us safely in a ditch and off the highway.

Despite the three hour traffic jam Doug showed up in minutes and towed us safely into Heber and worked out the charges with enterprise so I didn’t have to continue fighting w their agents. These guys are pros.

reviews.name: diana dodson
reviews.text: these guys are angels. doug was extremely helpful on the phone and roy was absolutely amazing getting me my son and my car home safely.

reviews.name: Jason Walker
reviews.text: These guys are Amazing. I was ran off the road by a logging truck near Mill Hollow Res. Doug was great on the phone and Roy the driver was able to pull my trailer out of the mud with very minor damage. ROY is the man!!!!!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Jason for the 5 star review. Roy and Doug are the best. Thanks for allowing us to help you get your trailer out of a bad situation.

reviews.name: Skylar
reviews.text: Well I had to get a vehicle out of impound the price wasn't the best for only being there one day but it wasn't the worst I've encountered either.  I am certain that no one is ever happy when this happens to them considering that fact aside, they answered their phone number provided and came quickly to take my card payment and release my vehicle.  Upon releasing my vehicle I noticed that the battery was dead and the man working there was nice enough to get his jumper pack out of the tow truck and help me get my vehicle started.  I'm giving this 5 star rating based on a few factors response time after calling being fast, how friendly the encounter went, and the price point which I believe was around $200.  Not letting my happiness over my car being impounded affect my review obviously it wouldn't be fair to the business in my opinion.  If you found this review helpful please give it a thumbs up 👍 and follow me for other reviews of places in the area,  thanks! 🙏
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Thanks Skler for the 5 star review. It's good to hear you were treated in a good manner when we came to release your car.
Brad Belcher
Owner

reviews.name: Kaylea Hopkins
reviews.text: $150 base price for a tow with $4 extra per mile towed. They answered the phone quickly and got to my location within 20 minutes during a big snow storm! Friendly service as well.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Kaylea, for the 5 star review and thanks for calling us and allowing us to serve you.

reviews.name: Adrienne White
reviews.text: We were in Logan from out of town and our car broke down near Beaver Mountain Resort and JC Auto was quick to come tow our vehicle to a nearby auto repair shop when we were in a pinch. The customer service over the phone was great. Thanks for your help!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: So glad we could help you out of a sticky situation.  Thank you for the 5 Stars!

reviews.name: Drake Russell
reviews.text: My wife and I got in a traffic accident and the front body of my wife’s car needed work done on it. JC took us in and gave us 2 months to pay everything off along with a rental car for free. They were done in just over two weeks and were  very friendly over the phone and in person and the car looks great. We even got a thank you card signed personally.

reviews.name: John Ebersole
reviews.text: I called to get a pull out at 1645 on 12/29. I was told it would be 4 hours. I said okay and gave my information. I waited. 13 hours later....NO CALL...NO SHOW. Thanks. Your phone even says that 'the user is not in service at this time'. WOW! Great customer service. Gave you business over a dozen times and always recommended your service. NOT ANY LONGER. Happy New Year as my truck is still stuck. Thanks.

reviews.name: Marty Anderson
reviews.text: The UHP had Dattage towing haul my van from an accident scene.  I have phoned multiple times this week in an effort to arrange payment, clean out my car and arrange for disposal.  The person who could help me was never available and when I insisted that the person who could help me return my call, they refused.  What kind of business refuses to return a phone call to a customer?  Update--they never did call back, but finally getting things taken care of.  Wow--$543 for a 4-mile tow--sticker shock!

reviews.name: Janet Anderson
reviews.text: They towed my car from an accident and will not return my phone call so that I can pay them or take care of my vehicle.

reviews.name: Braygan Hutchison
reviews.text:
Avoid! If you schedule a service and try to cancel, they'll still charge you the full price of towing, even if no towing actually took place and the driver never had to stop. They are not professional over the phone either and make it clear that they care more about making money than helping people.
There are cheaper places with kinder people, so save money and save your sanity. Go somewhere else.

reviews.name: Krasticlese
reviews.text: Fast to the phone!

reviews.name: Marcus Matautia
reviews.text: Worse customer service ever, the manager if we don’t pick up the phone don’t keep calling, if that’s the case than how will customers get ahold of your company to come help? Go to any company but this one they have no respect.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: I am sorry for your experience. Any missed calls we call back and sometimes the line gets blocked with the repeat calls when we try to call back. We are sorry if there was frustration shown over the phone. We work hard to get back to any missed calls and get a tow truck driver on their way right away!

reviews.name: Corbett Miles
reviews.text: Guy on the phone seemed a little annoyed at me. But the driver was very professional.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: I'm sorry you felt that way. Our goal is to happily provide you great towing service from scheduling to towing job. Since i m unaware of the situation on the phone i just want to apologize for that. I am so happy you had a great towing experience.

reviews.name: Rochelle Anderson
reviews.text: I just had my car breakdown on the way home from work and I called Logan Tow and he was SO nice on the phone and made it to me in less than 15min hooked the car up in less than 5min and towed it to the dealership... The only complaint I have was he blamed my Chiefs stickers that r on my window for my car not working🤣🤣(im seriously only kidding about it being a complaint,  it was Great to have someone with a sense of humor to help make a messed up situation better. I will absolutely use them again (hopefully wont  have to but if I do)

companies.name: Bozz Heavy Duty Towing and Diesel Roadside

reviews.name: Jenni Kidd
reviews.text: Miss Janna took our desperate call near dark. She was absolutely amazing! She made a suggestion over the phone that saved us. She showed up and was ready to help us any way she could. I 10 out of 10 recommend!!!

reviews.name: Brandon Fowler
reviews.text: We got stuck in the sand near coyote gulch. Everyone else that was nearby wouldn't help with a tow out of the sand because they were afraid they would get stuck too. Tried calling redrock towing, but they don't answer the phone after 5 pm. I called Heath and he answered on the first ring. He was willing to help. He knew exactly how to get us out quickly and safely. He even said he would follow us back to ensure our safety and to make sure we didn't get stuck again. He knows the desert, and he's a great conversationalist also. A tow out of the desert isn't cheap, but I felt his price was very fair for the work he was doing. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.name: Dallas Bleak
reviews.text: After a very long hike were a helicopter had to come and pick up my hiking buddy. I got stuck in the sand down Forty Mile which is far down Hole in the Rock Road. Hitched a ride back to Escalante because we had no cell service. Got in Escalante late and called Heath (the owner) and he was still out on another job. I got a room for the night and Heath and his son picked me up early the next morning and we went back down and got my car out. He is an honest guy with excellent character. The price was more than reasonable. I will concur with the other reviewers here. If your heading down Hole in the Rock Road put this number in your cell phone just in case you need it. You will not regret it. Thank you Heath for being so kind and reasonable!

companies.name: Bailout Tow and Transportation, Light and Heavy Duty Towing

reviews.name: Reese Movele
reviews.text: Just called to get some information and got hung up on. Now the guy won’t answer the phone..terrible customer service

reviews.name: T. Jones
reviews.text: When relying on this company to tow my car to the dealership for repair, they wouldn't answer their phone, when they did answer they would give an estimate for when they would be there and kept extending the time, 30 minutes, an hour, another hour before just canceling all together. Honestly would never recommend this company to anyone unless they don't actually need a tow, just want to waste time.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for your feedback. However, we could not find any record of your interaction with our company. We strive to provide excellent service and take customer comments seriously. If you have a genuine concern, please contact us directly for assistance.

reviews.name: Dani Guerrero
reviews.text: The woman I talked with on the phone was very friendly. She was patient, kind, and funny. She worked really well in helping me get assistance with my car. As for the gentleman who helped unlock my car; he too was very polite. Despite me showing up a little later than him. It seemed like he unlocked my car very quickly and with ease. I appreciate the time they took out of their day to help me. Highly recommend working with them

reviews.name: Fish Valdez
reviews.text: I'm so grateful for the service you provided, not only did you get to me in a timely manner but got my car and I off a busy freeway because of a dead battery and popped tire. What started as a horrible, scary situation changed with just a phone call. I will highly recommend your services to friends and family in need of a tow service. Thank you again!!

reviews.name: FINESSE CHICKA
reviews.text: Phone rang once and was answered. It was perfect. Thank you!

reviews.name: Lacee Black
reviews.text: They called back fairly quickly and were so friendly on the phone. I appreciated they prompt service and understanding for my situation.

reviews.name: Harley Cook
reviews.text: I called 5 places total and Kar tow were the only ones to come help. Steve was great! Really handled my motorcycle with care and knew what he was doing. I was given a quote over the phone and that was what I paid. Great service

reviews.name: Travis Goris
reviews.text:
Good service hard to contact over the phone.
However in person they try to make your visit fast and caring as if you are a old friend.

reviews.name: Rebecca Castillo
reviews.text: They can never answer the phone, it’ll ring put no one will pick up the phone. Bad service

reviews.name: Mark Nell
reviews.text: Anyone who goes up big Cottonwood Canyon on a regular basis should just have his number in their phone. He responds super quick, and gets the job done.

reviews.name: Jay Z
reviews.text: I called, said he would be over in a hour.. After two hours he won't answer his phone or texts..I'm not sure he is in business at all,  left me high and dry.

companies.name: West Coast Heavy Duty Towing & Recovery

reviews.name: David Griffeth
reviews.text:
Had to get a car to a shop for a bad starter    Just when we went to touch base as Murphys law had it my phone kept dropping their calls.    Once my phone decided to work and we were able to touch base they were here fast and when they said they would be.     I will use them again next time I need a tow service.
Car made it safely to the shop
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Happy to serve you!

reviews.name: Maria King
reviews.text: My car died in Saratoga springs on redwood road. I called AAA at 10:30am and they were sending Moana Towing. Told me it would be an hour. Called back at 11:50 am and was told it was going to be another hour. They sent me a link so I could see the drivers progress, shows arrival time 12:48. Called back at 1:20 and also attempted to call the business directly. No one answers their business phone and their voice mail is full. AAA tried to contact the driver directly and nothing. Called a local towing company to pay out of pocket. They arrived 20 minutes after calling. DO NOT USE this company.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: I'm sorry for your bad experience Maria. There must have been a miscommunication between the insurance company and our business! We pride ourselves in great customer service so please let us know if there is anything we can do!

reviews.name: Justin Matthews
reviews.text: My son's car died on the side of the road and I was stuck without a car to go get him.  He was there for a while in 20 degree weather when Heneli showed up and tried to help, after 10:00!  He then offered us a deal to tow the car home.  We took it!  It was very nice to have a pleasant person who was so nice to try and help, and then offer great service to get my son home.  Everything went smoothly and we got the car, and my son home safe.  I will definitely keep Moana towing on my phone when we have a problem again. The service is outstanding.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for the kind words Justin. We are so glad we could help your son get home safe.

companies.name: Mountain West Extreme Off Road Recovery
Mountain West Extreme Off Road Recovery

reviews.name: Ellis Atwood
reviews.text: Friendly on the phone, showed up in 15 minutes, and even invited my four year old to "help" load the truck. Price is never fun for these sorts of services, but I thought their quote was reasonable and honest.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for this review. You are right paying for adulthood has never been fun. We are doing our best to keep the price fair, so thanks for your kind words. I hope your child had a blast!

reviews.name: Trenten Cunningham
reviews.text:
Absolutely wonderful. Dispatcher was patient and easy to work with. They answered the phone immediately, even on a Sunday, in the evening. They found my location in about twenty minutes and gave me an ETA of about the same time.

The company was exemplary with their service. While I definitely want to avoid another breakdown in the near future, if it happens, I'm calling these guys.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: You’re the best, thank you! We’re so glad we could be there when you needed us (even on a Sunday!). Fingers crossed no more breakdowns, but if it happens, we’ve got your back.

reviews.name: Lesley Shuman
reviews.text: On Monday November 20th our car broke down just outside of Nephi. We had to have our car towed twice. AM PM towing was the second towing company. We needed are car towed from Nephi to Orem.  I was with my husband and 2 kids. They asked how many passengers on the  phone we advised 4. We had to wait almost 2 hours for them.  There was 2 gentleman who came.  The back seat to the towing truck was full and things had to be removed. My 7 year old daughter had to set on my lap while all 4 of us was crammed into the backseat.  My daughter was trying to make small talk and they acted to put out to carrier on a conversation.  The guy in the passenger seat kept falling asleep.  I know he was not driving but he was still on the job and that very unprofessional to fall asleep on the job.  The customer service was horrible. They both acted put out that they had to tow us. I know that Orem to Nephi is not convent and to us that was an expense we did not want. For a $300 tow job you should at least have the common curtesy to be friendly and not fall asleep on the job.  I don't thin we will be calling this towing company again.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Lesley, I am sorry to hear about this experience. We have days where calls are just piling up and the dispatchers are just getting the calls out as soon as they can. I believe we made a mistake in sending out a driver that was training, not realizing it, making the comfort of this ride for you and your family unfair and for that I apologize. Moving onto the interactions you all had with our drivers, again we are so sorry you had this experience. I wish that the trainee was not falling asleep, as I agree, seems very unprofessional, and I appreciate this being brought to our attention as I do plan on pulling him in and going over this review with him. We pride ourselves on excellent customer service and your experience does not meet our expectations either. I apologize and I hope we can prove ourselves to you in the future, if you wish to give us another try.

reviews.name: monster scribbles
reviews.text: I don't know which driver it was but just now (10/27 @9pm) your employee getting on I-15 at the 8th North on ramp almost crashed a minimum of 2 cars. I don't know if he was on his phone or what. He almost rear ended the car in front of him then decided to swerve into my lane as fast as possible, almost hitting me. He missed by inches and if anyone was on my left he would have caused a big, totally avoidable crash. The road was mostly wide open and going at a constant rate of speed, the cars were not a surprise nor did they change lanes causing him to drive that way. Interesting strategy to drum up more tow business. Do something. This is not the first run in with your drivers on the road. Considering how much damage your trucks could do, this is ridiculous.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: We appreciate your feedback. Its most helpful to call us and let us know as soon as something like this happens as we have several trucks on the roadways and several days later its hard to determine which driver it was to correct said behavior. We take safety seriously and drivers are trained for 2 straight weeks to ensure they understand our safety policies. Once they are out on their own we trust they continue to respect roadways and surrounding traffic. I agree from what you explained is unacceptable and I will do my best to track down who this driver was. Thank you for making us aware. If you can think of any other details to help me determine which driver this was, I would like to get him off the roadways. Please call 801-375-8697 please ask for Casie.

reviews.name: Marian Larsen
reviews.text: In the early morning, still pitch black at night, my husband and I experienced much more than a flat, (we had just changed our tires a day prior and received a faulty one) we googled 24 hour towing and had called a few places that didn't answer when we got down the list to theirs. Now they were farther away but that didn't matter at all because the customer service was the absolute best thing about the night we had. Both the woman on the phone and Guy (the guy) who came and gave us a tow were helpful, kind and personable. We were half an hour outside of Provo and they got there in almost exactly half an hour. We dropped the car off at a shop and then Guy gave us a ride home. Based on the conversation we had with him it is clear Am Pm towing is run by a fair, kind boss who actually cares about his employees and the customers and that is refreshing. Hopefully we won't need to be towed again but if we did they would be my first thought.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Marian, We are so happy that we could help you in a time of need! Its true what Guy says, we do care! Nothing worse that being stranded in the middle of the night. I am so glad that my team was available and could get to you right away. Thanks for the great review, we appreciate you!

companies.name: The Rolling Aces Towing and Auto

reviews.name: Tyler Evans
reviews.text: The customer service was unmatched! The woman I spoke with on the phone, Christie, went above and beyond to make sure my needs were met. She was so understanding of my situation and gave me all the information I needed. If your car is having a bad day, this is definitely the company you should call! They exceeded my expectations in every way imaginable!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much!!! We are glad to help! Have a great day!

reviews.name: Hector Garza
reviews.text: It all started with a phone call from my son. Panicking and down that his truck broke down in Murry Ut. We just had the truck repaired from the transmission a month ago. We're from Texas so I hopped in my truck and drove 26hr to his location. He had it the computer hooked up and it said that cylinder 1,3,5,7 were misfireing  well with that said I was prepared to tow his truck back to the RGV. When I got there we changed the spark plug and swapped the coils from my truck to his but no luck. At that point I didn't want to tow it so I looked up auto shop in the area on a Sunday and lucky they where open. They took the truck in around 3-4pm they started doing there diosnostic which they didn't charge. They first started with the compression test to see if there was no issue there. After that they tested all the injectors all working well. They move on to the coils they were having signal that came and go. At that point they started with the computer which everything was working. They decided to clean the connections and re program the computer. That didn't fix the problem so they move on to the fuse box. When they open the top plate they notice alot of corrosion underneath. They started to remove all corrosion and tested the truck again and it worked. No more misfire  the relief on my son face was worth it. My son thought that the lifters and cam got damaged. And we got it back on Monday around 5pm. When my son jumped in his truck he notice that the abs light was gone awell. My son had the abs module changed out but never programed it. Ceasar took it upon him self to programed it at no extra cost which In My book that is what a shop should be. Honest and caring. The only sad part is that we don't have a shop like his in my hometown. Thank for helping us out.

reviews.name: Megan Chase
reviews.text:
Five stars for Cesar and his crew! I was having engine trouble and despite trying to problem-solve myself, needed a bit of extra help. Murray Auto’s hours were so convenient. I gave them a call, and they were willing to see me the same day. They ran diagnostics to make sure there were no issues other than what I already knew about and then got down to business and fixed it.

I never once felt pressured or upsold. They were very matter of fact and respected my opinion, which I really appreciated. They were also incredibly timely (I was maybe sitting in the waiting area for an hour at most).

Cesar was friendly and caring both on the phone and in person. I felt truly cared for as a client and not like I was “just another number” like I’ve felt at previous auto shops.

My car was running SO much better when I left! It honestly felt like I was driving a completely different car.

Thanks again, Cesar. I will definitely be coming back!

reviews.name: Micheal Giron
reviews.text: For your information I am Hispanic. You  had my car for 10 days. It was there so long that my phone hold was melted to the windshield. I had to talk to  the mechanic through his phone. If you want your car to sit in the back lot for ever,and get yelled at for checking on it, just look at his lot it's loaded with tons of cars waiting to be worked on.  None of his mechanics speak English.. DON'T waste your time and money. If you want his type of service, find an empty parking lot and let it there. What a joke.The owner sits at home answers from  his couch and has his mechanic try and work on the cars.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
This is so racist !!! We identify ourselves as Latino Owned place . Is your choice to come here and deal with someone who’s trying it’s best and you being completely rude and racist to them , then pulling up your racism in a bad review ??, we have never charged you a dime for what we did for you, we diagnosed you Aribags were bad, we diagnosed your lights and you needed LED bulbs that weren’t available anywhere , your vehicle was here for 3 days in total . And you took it without even saying thanks good luck brother , we are not going to tolerate RACISM WHATSOEVER , .


, stop your bullying, your lies , and your racism.My dealership will always be full of cars , we don’t have vehicles waiting to be worked on, we are dealers as well

reviews.name: David Girard
reviews.text:
Stay away from these dishonest guys. They completely lied to me about what was wrong with my car just to try and hook for another day.  Total waste of time and effort !!!

Update - You bet your life I was there! Bought a coffee from the shop across the street. I was driving my car through the US to California. Took a photo to text my wife to show here what a dump you place is ( attached )...

Came on Sunday June 24 to get my AC checked for my Escalade... your mechanic checked and said "no problem" it just needs a couple of parts. We can order them on Monday and get it fixed for you. I'll call you by 10:30. No one called - no one answers the phone so I drive down there from my hotel because we're just passing through and it's 100+ and I have no AC! Kind of important!! Guy in the shop says he can;t get hold of the boss and he's been trying all morning because he needs authorization to buy the parts.. told him no problem - I authorize and I'll even go get them! He says gimme 5 mins to talk to his boss... he comes back and now tells that he needs a special part to diagnose the problem and it won't be here until Wednesday... really? I thought you already diagnosed it?? I inform him that I cannot wait that long as I'm just driving through, but can at least tell me what parts I need so I can possibly save some time and get them installed at another shop along my route...let me ask the mechanic... with head hung low he says "again - I am very embarrassed, but they really didn't know what parts I needed and still need to do a full diagnosis" - so thanks for wasting 2 days of time and effort... FYI - went to the Cadillac dealership - problem was diagnosed, and parts purchased from NAPA. Thanks for nothing!!!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
ok , your review has several contradictions. First we never said we needed "some parts" , we said we needed a special tool (AC Pressure test machine) , to find and fix your Freon Leakage. We told you that "the boss" aka Myself, i was out of the State and they were communicating with me the whole time, we have a Chat group where we work all of our 5 mechanics together. They always kept me informed about you and your vehicle , and we never charged you a dime. You said that you took your car to the Cadillac Dealership (Jerry Seinner) which we are partners with, and we buy parts from THEM, and Jerry Seinner will never go and buy parts from NAPA , to sell them to you. 

3rd , there's absolutely no way you could've got in the service of Jerry Seinner the same day, with no appointment. 

and last but not least. Your comment about my office being a dump its completely racist and out of place. This is an Auto Repair Shop, not one of your "luxury" Vacation places out of Sun Cabo Vacations, so don't expect luxury at an Auto Repair Shop's Office. 

Thank you for sharing your experience, and i can't wait to go visit YOUR business now.

reviews.name: Gary John Giancola
reviews.text: Cesar's company is legitimate.  He quickly diagnosed and fixed an AC clutch issue.  He got me in very quickly (answered my phone call immediately) and he allowed me to be a part of the process by explaining to me visually while the car was raised and also answering questions I had. He is originally from Chile and appreciates the opportunity America has given him. He is a genuinely nice person and fun to talk to.  He is ambitious and a big time go-getter! I would not hesitate to recommend his services. A+++
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Hi Gary! Thank you so much for your kind words and for choosing Murray Auto Repair. It was a pleasure to help you with the AC clutch issue, and I'm glad you appreciated our prompt service and the chance to be part of the process. We take pride in providing top-notch customer service and ensuring our clients are well-informed throughout the repair. If you have any more questions or need assistance in the future, don't hesitate to reach out.

reviews.name: Shelley VanNieuwenhuyzen
reviews.text: waited for over 2 hours for them to arrive to change a tire, before someone else changed it.  they NEVER showed  and they wouldn’t answer their phone.. all the while telling good sam’s they were 15 minutes out. TRASH COMPANY

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.text:
I normally only leave reviews about places I've had good experiences with but I had to make an exception here. I received bottom-tier service for my lock-out. It took over 2 hours for him to reach me after changing the ETA multiple times. On the phone he said he'd be heading right to me after finishing a jump-start nearby, then proceeded to take another hour to arrive. He just lied on the phone. My insurance auto-assigned this company to me when I made a roadside assistance claim. It's a very bad look on any insurance who uses this company's services. If you get assigned this company, I'd honestly recommend cancelling your assistance request and making a new one to hopefully get reassigned.

Granted, when he did arrive, he was really fast at getting it done. It took him maybe 30 seconds to get into the car. It's clear he knows what he's doing, he's just not fast to arrive and is a poor communicator. The speed of the service just makes the slow arrival time even more confusing. I could have called around for quotes, booked another company, gotten my car unlocked, gotten home, and filed for reimbursement with insurance before he arrived. Lesson learned.

reviews.name: Corey Hunt
reviews.text: Didn't show up or answer the phone

reviews.name: Jake Draper
reviews.text: These guys are absolutely amazing. I have been taking my vehicles to them for a while now and I have been blown away by them every single time. Every employee is so experienced and explains everything to where you really understand it. They always answer the phone or respond to your message and just make everything so easy all around. The best service center around here truly!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you Jake for the fantastic review.  We are grateful for you business and are always grateful when our efforts to provide excellent service is recognized.  Thank you again.

reviews.name: Danny LaDue
reviews.text:
I'm a small business owner in Sandy, so I really want to be able to support other small businesses in the area. But unfortunately Alta View Car Care can't be one of them.

I called in advance, and let Alta View know I've got two tires on my vehicle with punctures. I've personally plugged the punctures with rope repair plugs. I wanted the reassurance of tire technician to remove the tire and patch from the inside, more than happy to pay for this service. Alta View couldn't do it same day, no worries, I completely understand, so I schedule the service for Monday. I drop the vehicle off on Monday, make sure the service advisor knows two rear tires have plugs in them, even describe the piece of metal removed from the second of the two tires. Dropped off at 9am, called at 3pm to check. Not looked at yet (no worries, I get it). I was assured they would call back later in the day. I did not receive a call back that day. I called repeatedly Tuesday morning, hoping for an update, maybe even pick up the vehicle on my way to work - no answer. I stop by anyway on my way to work. Service advisor says the technician was NOT ABLE TO FIND THE SLOW LEAK. I didn't report a slow leak. I spoke to two different service advisors ahead of time, let them know two tires had DIY plugs, and I wanted technician installed internal patches. Alta View had my vehicle all day, no call to update, won't answer the phone the next morning, and all you can say is the technician can't find a non-existent slow leak?!?!? Can he find a DIY plug in a tire?!?! Can you call to update a customer?!?!?!

It pains me to say this, but the larger tire stores offer equal, maybe better service. I'm stil on the lookout for a local business I can use for automotive repair.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Danny, we are so sorry you had a bad experience.  We were transitioning to a new phone service when you had this experience.  We are sorry, your experience just does not reflect the experience most of our customers have, as evidenced by almost all of our other reviews.

reviews.name: Amanda Parramoure
reviews.text:
Not surprised to find additional horrible reviews. Obviously they don’t care, but I can assure you these guys are the worst.
Re: Orem “location”
1. Customer service - My first grader can talk better than they can, and my 16 yo gives better customer service at his job. They don’t hardly help you on the phone, it’s like talking to a brick wall. They don’t know what a PDF is or if they can take it lol.
No phone number listed!
2. SCAM - Towed three miles = $36 fuel surcharge. 🤯
3. Finished paying and they say nothing. They say ”you’re good to go.” Where is my car?!? I say, “I just walk around and find it on my own huh?” fed up by now. He casually gestures to the general area it’s in and I have to go get it.
4. He climbed in his car to complete the paperwork after walking away from me when I approached without saying a word of whose going to “help” me (not the right word for this place) or what to do, leaving me looking from one guy to another to figure out whose supposed to do what.
5. $430 to be towed THREE miles. I’ll be filing a complaint with the BBB next.

reviews.name: Anthony Nichols
reviews.text: Nobody answers the phone or when they do they say hello and then hang up.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Hmmm... We offer 24/7 dispatch but sometimes we do get slammed.  We may ask you to hold for a minute.

reviews.name: Tessa Cranston
reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars I would. Called to get my car towed and was told it would be an hour for $150. Obviously it was too good to be true. 45 minutes later got a call saying the boss answered the phone and the employee had no idea what was going on. I was told their company is dealing with the police department and 150 stolen cars so it would be another hour before they could make it. Basically the worst customer service I've ever had to deal with. When I called back the woman hung up on me. Never ask them for a tow even if it's $20 cheaper.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: We're sorry it didn't work out.

reviews.name: robyne peabody
reviews.text: My car was picked up quickly and towed safely. I really appreciated the verbal phone calls keeping me updated.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much for your kind review, Robyne! We really appreciate you sharing your experience with us.

reviews.name: Andrew Reynolds
reviews.text: The tow truck driver was nice and the operator on the phone was nice too
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks, Andrew! We’re glad our team could make the process good for you.

reviews.name: Caroline Tu'ikolovatu
reviews.text: They were so fast & nice when they came to help me get into my car. I locked my keys in my car and they came 10 minutes after I hung up the phone requesting for help. Awesome customer service!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you, Caroline! So glad we could assist you so quickly!

reviews.name: Wendy Bird
reviews.text:
I’ve had AAA for years and every renewal wonder why I keep it. Today it earned every penny of its membership. A rock the size of half a bowling ball flew at my car as I was heading south on redwood road. It hit the back driver side tire creating a seven inch gaping hole from its impact. I was so impressed with the gentleman who arrived within ten min of my phone call. He ensured my vehicle was safe and identified how to access the spare (it was under the car and there was a key to lower it out-)
He put the spare on and was professional and kind and SPEEDY!
I’m sold on remaining a AAA member for life now!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for trusting us and for your loyalty!

reviews.name: P C
reviews.text: 801 Roadside Assistance was amazing! Contacted them through Holman Fleet vehicle, and within minutes received a phone call with up-to-date roadside assistance. 15 minutes after making the initial phone call, I had an employee of 801 Roadside Assistance at my house changing the flat and installing the spare. Thank you 801 Roadside Assistance for such prompt and professional service for my company vehicle. You guys are superb and amazingly fast!!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Your kind words mean a lot to us, and we look forward to being there for you whenever you need us again. Thank you!

reviews.name: Eric Dusenberry
reviews.text: My insurance went through these guys to tow my Grand Prix, the tow was completely successfully but in order to tow it I had to wait on hold with Allstate customer service twice to do their job!!! They needed more money to row my disabled car... 260 dollar tow from West Valley to Kearns... my steering was messed up due to the rack and pinion but why am I on the phone with the insurance company to do your job!?!

reviews.name: Jesse Buchanan
reviews.text: My vehicle’s alternator gave out at night, in freezing rain. Andres, the owner, answered the phone and came right away. He was polite and  kind. Price was fair. Would definitely use him again.

reviews.name: Kassady Dalton
reviews.text: Very happy we called Instant Haul Towing. They were polite on the phone and were very understanding of my frustration being broken down. Made the best out of a bad situation.

reviews.name: Nicole Hemsley
reviews.text:
Colin and his girlfriend (so sorry I did not catch your name!) helped me so much, I’m so grateful!
I was stranded for almost 2 hours having the worst day with my babies in car seats when he pulled up to help me home, all before I could even schedule with my insurance!
I barely had phone service and it was cold. Uber had no availability, (just the worst luck tonight) so he made sure we got a safe ride home! They went above and beyond and helped me get my boys warm and back safe! I’m so grateful to you both!

reviews.name: AthenaScissorhands
