reviews.responseFromOwnerText: I apologize for the experience you encountered here. I would like to state that when the vehicle was towed it, it had previously had work done from a mobile mechanic. The AC was empty there was no Freon in it. We had asked for you to bring the vehicle back so that we could put dye in the system and test it for leaks, I apologize that it took a couple days to have done that. As far as Kylie messaging your mother, it was due to her paying the bill so she wanted to stay in contact to know what was going on, and to why the vehicle was back here after being just repaired by someone else. As far as being called you were called and left a voicemail Friday 9/26 at 11:15 AM and the keys were then put in the vehicle as requested after being notified of the vehicle being finished. There was a leak and the leak was fixed and filled back up with Freon. As a grown adult I feel you could have come in and talked to me personally about this situation so that we could make things right and assert any issues there may be. If you have anymore questions please feel free to contact me thanks. Mike

reviewContext.Services: Car towing, Air conditioning, Service not listed

reviews.name: E. Davis
reviews.text:
18AUG2025 - After my car broke down 1,400 miles from home our tow truck driver recommended Mike's. Because I was passing through the area I didn't have a preference so I took him up on his recommendation. I'm glad I did! Mike was friendly, quickly diagnosed the issue, and provided details of next steps. Mary, the office manager, was an angel throughout the process. She greeted everyone who came in the door with a smile. She immediately made a couple phone calls and ordered the part, which needed to be overnighted. She gave me a rundown of the charges and provided a timeline of when the work would be finished--which was 100% spot on. Mary and Mike left me with the utmost of confidence after what was a stressful situation. I thank them wholeheartedly for that. I was so confident after leaving Mike's that I drove the entire remaining 625 miles to my final destination that day. I felt that Mike's labor charges where extremely competitive. One thing I learned from Mike is to go with OEM replacement parts rather than aftermarket parts. Technology has advanced to where aftermarket parts are not entirely compatible and the slightest bit of incompatibility will shut down the vehicle.
I highly recommend Mike's Auto Clinic!

reviews.name: Jason Bernardino
reviews.text: Scammers. Lady will give you price over the phone then you come into the store and says oops idk why I have given you that price and basically doubles the charge once there.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Jason, When estimates are given over the phone for a quick price we do not have all the correct information. We will take into consideration asking for the proper vehicle information over the phone to give more accurate estimates. Sorry for the inconvenience. Thanks Mike.

reviews.name: Nicole Burger
reviews.text: This is one of the most horrific places in Richfield. Having to give them 1 star doesn’t set well. They are a AAA provider. Meaning, when you call AAA. They send Mikes Auto. I’m a local here in Monroe. My phone number is a Nevada number. I called AAA from my cell, and I asked for them to send a flat bed to pick up my van on a Sunday. The driver came from Mike’s Auto in Richfield. I informed the driver where I wanted my vehicle to be dropped. (Which wasn’t Mikes) The driver took it back to Mikes. The next day, when I found out where my vehicle was. I contacted them. After they finally found my van, they informed me that it was going to cost me $900.00 to fix it. It was a cracked radiator which runs about $150.00 for the part. Let’s now talk about the fact I told the driver to take it to another location. After having words with their unprofessional manager. I had them take it where I ask them to take it originally. My van was then fixed, and rolling down the road for $350.00! 😊 So, fast forward to today. I call AAA again. It’s been a year plus later. This is for a different vehicle. Guess who they send? Mikes Auto! The driver couldn’t find me. I finally spoke to the driver, and I told him that I didn’t need a jump start. I needed to have a flat bed take my truck home. I was in Richfield at the time, but needed to get it to Monroe. The driver told me that he would be where I was in 5 minutes. 15 minutes goes by, and AAA calls, and tells me that Mikes Auto couldn’t do the job. They now had to send someone from Manti. Coming from Manti to Richfield is going to be at least another 2 plus hours. ( I’ve been waiting now for an hour and a half.) Lol, Mikes Auto obviously punched in my address, and profiled me. This kind of behavior is unacceptable, and extremely unprofessional! The fact you call AAA and they are the only provider here in Richfield is suspect! Let’s not mention that they prey on the folks that are out of town. Now let’s talk about how they want to take advantage of the folks here. They pick up your vehicle, and take it to their shop regardless of what they are instructed to do. They then charge you a 70 percent mark up. Hoping people can’t afford to pick up their vehicle. Mikes Auto also sells cars.  Go figure! I let this go the first time. Shame on me! Like a lot of us, we feel we just don’t have the time. Having said that, These people are unscrupulous! They have a monopoly on the AAA calls here in Richfield, and they have the power to just say no. They also prey on the less fortunate folks here. The people here that can’t afford to pay their 70 percent mark up to get their car back. So, Mikes wins again! They fix the vehicle, and sell it! Please don’t be like I was initially. Let’s not let these people continue to do this! This review is just the beginning. I sure hope this helps other folks.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: I apologize you feel like you have been profiled out. Back in May of 2024 we sold our AAA Towing contract to another provider so I apologize for the experience you had with them, but that was not us. I can give you the AAA Rep's telephone Number if you would like to send me an email or call in so you can file a complaint through AAA. There are other providers in Sevier county if you go into your APP you can also see other AAR providers in the area also. As far as 70% mark up I would love to go over your history here to see how that would have happened. Feel free to reach out and I'd love to answer any questions you have. Thank You.

reviews.name: Alex Smith
reviews.text: Mike's Auto saved the day for my wife and I while we were on vacation in UT. Our car broke down on Memorial Day at a Capitol Reef National Park and we had it towed to Mike's. They answered the phone on the holiday and agreed to look at the car ASAP the next day. True to their word, they evaluated the car quickly and by noon the next day they'd identified the issue (mass air flow sensor clogged/dirtied up from cottonwood pollen/blooms) and had the car running great.  They really saved the day and were nothing short of pleasant and professional throughout the whole experience. I hope to not breakdown and need them again, but if I do I know they'll take great care of us again.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for your review, I am happy we were able to help you out.

reviews.name: Wesley Brackenbury
reviews.text: My 1939 Ford deluxe coupe had quit on me on Spanish Fork Main Street once I got it off the road my cousin that runs Earl’s Customs shop told me to call Judd’s. Had to wait for a little bit as they were busy, which I understand once they showed up they got a call and had to respond to that call, which I totally understand so the driver knew of my cousin knew where his shop was. I handed him the keys in a couple hours later they gave me a call said it was delivered paid for over the phone Not a scratch on the car. What a wonderful job I will continue using them in the future.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Wesley, we're glad Judd's Towing & Recovery could assist you with your classic Ford. We understand that unexpected delays can be frustrating, but we appreciate your understanding and patience. We're pleased to hear your vehicle arrived safely and undamaged, and look forward to serving you again in the future.

reviews.name: Steve Sonne
reviews.text: Fast, friendly and fair service. Helped me in a bind. Picked up the phone with a live person early I. The morning. Will definitely call next time I need a tow.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: We're glad we could assist you, Steve. Our team is committed to providing prompt and courteous service, even at early hours. We look forward to assisting you again in the future, should the need arise.

reviews.name: Spencer Croshaw
reviews.text: Dallin at Judds was great!  Picked up the phone.  Arrived when he said he would. Very accommodating.  Highly recommend!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: We're pleased Dallin could provide such efficient and accommodating service, Spencer. We value your business and recommendation!

reviews.name: Wendy Santos
reviews.text:
Phone calls at 1 AM are terrifying and usually not a good thing.  The phone call at 1 AM is to telling you your child has been in a bad accident on the highway, is beyond terrifying!  It is horrifying and riddled with excruciating anxiety and fear.  In this moment you look for anyone that can help you and comfort you, ease your angst and help you with things that you may or may not know what to do about at that moment.  You look for people that are ready to help you in a moment’s notice and do so with so much kindness, patience and empathy.
Dallin with Judd’s Towing is EXACTLY the person you hope to you will find!  After things started to calm down a tiny bit, Dallin arrived on scene to tow the vehicle.  It was cold, it had been raining, some spots were icey, it was muddy, it was…. not the least bit ideal or anything that he would have wanted to get out of bed for!!  But we DID NOT see one shred of evidence that he may not want to be there or that he was not happy about the cold, rain, mud, yucky spot, etc. instead we saw a smile accompanied with unbelievable kindness, patience, empathy, sincerity, respect for our property and help!!  He knew what to do, he didn’t make us feel like we were taking to much of his time, he answered questions asked if he could help us with anything else, made sure we had the best number to call when we found out what to do next.  He was simply …. Awesome!!  Further interaction with Dallin since that night has been nothing shy of any of the above and I 100% recommend Judd’s for any and all towing needs!!  Again, Judd’s and Dallin were, in that moment, exactly what I hoped would be there to ease the anxiety and take away the fear, and … he did!!  Thank you isn’t big enough, but … thank you Dallin!!

reviews.name: Sean Bates
reviews.text: Tayton was amazing on the phone and got me set up and ready to go in minutes! Dallon was an amazing driver and got me hooked up and took me right where i needed to go. All the other towing companies cannot compare! Amazing customer service. Amazing work. If I ever need a tow again I know who to call!

companies.name: Droubay Chevrolet Buick Service and Towing
Kiteley's Boat Trailer Repair & Service Center

reviews.name: Miranda Miller
reviews.text: Carolyn was absolutely amazing. My friend and I are on a long road trip and Hanksville was one of many stops. We have a Jeep rental and the check engine light came on. I didn’t see any other options around this area to have it looked at but I called and Carolyn answered and  helped us out so much over the phone. Although she was not able to help fix the issue at this shop, she directed me i. where to go and made sure I was safe getting there. The care she showed in helping us get what we needed was very much appreciated.

reviews.name: denise paske
reviews.text:
Jeff/Carolyn became my port in the storm. Off road disaster thousands of miles from home. When I heard Carolyn's voice on the phone after making it to Hanksville I knew that I was safe and that somehow I'd gotten into the hands of a couple who knew how scared I was and would help me solve my problems. We got to know one another very well in the cab of their massive tow truck over the hours it took for them to transfer me the 150 miles to Grand Junction to the Subaru dealership. You can count on them for top notch service and generous hearts.
Denise Paske
Chicagoland area

reviews.name: Jenny Goessel
reviews.text: We had the misfortune of losing brakes 10 miles up into the Henry mtns, then the incredibly good fortune of getting an SOS text out to Alexander's towing. Andy found us within the hour...after hours. Not only did he get us safely down the mtn with a temporary roadside fix but was also able to procure a brake hose back in Hanksville to get us back on the road the next day. These guys aren't your average  fair weather tow service...they've got some serious Utah backcountry road skills. And they're good solid individuals to boot. Thank you SO much for taking excellent care of us, Andy, Garrett & Bob...and Ryan from Delaware with the sat phone 🙏 You guys rock!

reviews.name: Janet Johnson
reviews.text: Had a flat tire and called to ask about new tire.  The guy on the phone said to come in and he’d order one that would be there tomorrow. I’m stranded today and told him the size I needed to see if he had a used one or something to get me by. He kept pushing for me to come in to order one and I told him I needed to know if he had that size because if not, I needed to call around to find someone who did and he said “Bye then” and hung up on me. How rude! He didn’t try to check his used tire selection or anything to answer my question or help me.

reviews.name: Enzo Legname
reviews.text:
"Don't ever use these  guys they are very
Racist Company my roadside contracted through them to tow my vehicle they never should up i called them to find out what is the eta a guy answer the phone very rude and called me a stupid wet back Mexican ps don't ever use them at all

reviews.name: Reece Roo
reviews.text: Our car broke down in middle of no where on freeway right outside of Fillmore and roadside assistance sent A-1 towing to come get our vehicle around 8pm. 12 hours later we drive to our destination and pass our vehicle that was never towed by A-1. Still parked on the side of the freeway. We tried calling the company over and over again since 7am and no one will answer their phone and won't call back ! Do not hire this company to come tow you. They are clearly not reliable at all! I will never use this company and make sure everyone I know doesn't either ! Horrible horrible company.

reviews.name: Jacquelyn George
reviews.text: My insurance Liberty Mutual went through this company to tow my car on Tuesday August 2nd, 2016. I had got a call from a worker saying he was on his way to my car and then got a voicemail saying that my car doors were locked there was nothing they could do and never answered his phone when I attempted to call him back. The next day I drove from Clearfield, Utah to Salt Lake City, Utah to unlock my car doors and check on my car and my car was gone. I called the mechanics place it was supposed to be taken too and the company DID END UP TOWING my car and NEVER let me kno and didn't park in the right spot and relocked my keys back in my car and parked it in front of their gas pumps, so now I have to pay for an extra 30 minites of labor out of MY POCKET because they couldn't make ONE QUICK AND SIMPLE PHONE CALL to me to let me know that they ended up towing my car when the voicemail said that they couldn't and tell me they did so l could of walked to the service place and got my keys out and dropped them off to them so l could of avoided having to pay EXTRA!!!! THANK YOU SOOOO MUCH A1 INDEPENDENT YOU WILL NEVER EVER HAVE MY BUSINESS AGAIN EVEN IF I GO THROUGH MY INSURANCE. AND I'LL MAKE DAMN SURE OF THAT TOO!!!!!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: I'm so sorry you had such a bad experience but I really think you are mistaking me with the other A-1 Towing company.

reviews.name: Spencer Nelson
reviews.text: I waited for 2 hours in Riverdale Utah to get my car towed at 2 am. I called the company to find out why the driver had not showed up. Keep in mind they were about 30 min late already. The guy that answered the phone was very rude. He told me he could not locate the driver while being on the phone. He then hung up and never called back. I then recalled my insurance company where in turn they too tried to reach the driver. The insurance company called me back and told me they sent a different tow driver out from another company due to the fact that they too were unable to reach the tow driver that was supposed to have came in the first place. If I could I would give this negative 5 stars. I DO NOT SUGGEST THIS UTTERLY TERRIBLE TOWING COMPANY!!!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: I'm so sorry you had such a bad experience but I really think you are mistaking me with another A-1 towing company.

reviews.name: Jeanette Sterner
reviews.text:
We were on vacation in Glacier heading back towards Phoenix which is in a record heat wave when we ran into some issues with our Diesel truck on what was a Utah holiday. We were towing an RV , had 2 digs in the truck and breaking down in the middle of nowhere in the heat with the dogs was not an option. Virtually eveything was closed. We spoke with Richard Dearden on the phone who was able to have his nephew Chris get to the shop and help us out. LOVE that this is a family owned business that takea so much pride and caring in their comoany, They were all about customer service, very fair pricing and thankfully solved our issue.
After we left another faulty sensor set our truck back into limp mode, we called back and they helped us once again by referring us to another mechanic that was in route to Phoenix by way of Beaver city south of them. Our next issue was fixed the following morning thankfully and it was all thanks to Dearden Towing & Diesel Repair. I cannot say enough good things about Dearden towing and Diesel Repair and the help they provided us to get home safely   I would highly recommend them and wish that I had a shop like this in our home city Phoenix. Would refer them to anybody ♡ Thank you !

reviews.name: Grant Chaisson
reviews.text: I ran out of diesel today right out side of nephi called these guys and they picked up the phone right away and showed  up with a enough diesel to get me to 1/4 tank of fuel and back on the road to the next gas station.

reviews.name: Shannon T
reviews.text:
Great guy! He did a good job saving us on the side of the freeway when our van broke down in the middle of nowhere. Answered the phone at 10 pm on a Friday night and cheerfully showed up as soon as humanly possible.
Hooked up and loaded our vehicle in a matter of minutes, and soon had us back to civilization and to a repair shop, where it could be fixed in a few days. Perfect, couldn't ask for anything more under those unfortunate circumstances. Lifesaver.

reviews.name: Jamie Fellers
reviews.text: James did a fantastic job answering the phone when most companies in the area would not. Thermostat quit working, leaving myself, my 9 month old, my nephew, my dogs, and my wife on the side of the interstate. Was very prompt, knowledgeable, and extremely professional!

reviews.name: Blair Butler
reviews.text:
Was recently broke down outside Salina Utah. Dearden towing was fast (under 20 min!), friendly and they really came through for me.
Here's the story, if you're interested:
I was on my motorcycle I had covered over 900 miles in southern and central Utah over a couple of days. Riding alone when she, I can her Bianca, just stopped (later found out it was due to faulty pulley screws from the factory).
Fortunately have AAA "RV" roadside assistance. The RV is because they will not tow a motorcycle unless you have RV level coverage, which also covers double (up to 100 mi.) towing miles.
I contacted AAA and completed the online request for roadside assistance. I received a text and a phone call to confirm my location and AAA membership. Ryan called from Dearden Towing, he confirmed my location and told me he would be there in 10 minutes. He was.
Together we loaded my 700 lb. bike onto a flatbed tow truck. Ryan, a full time school teacher and coach, dad, and an all around cool guy. We anchored my bike with 4 tie downs until we were both satisfied that it was well secured. He then drove me 100 miles to my mechanics garage.
He was kind, generous. I would recommend Ryan and Dearden Towing to anyone who wants fast and friendly towing service in central Utah.
I understand they also have a auto repair service, however I did not see it, or use it, so I cannot give it a review.

reviews.name: Ethan Johnson
reviews.text: I don’t even know where to start!!! My truck started having a misfire problem about 120 miles from their shop. I called the office and somehow, someway Kadi and Sarah , the secretaries, were there doing some cleaning and they answered the phone. They asked me what my problem was and if I needed a tow. I told them yes and they sent their tow truck driver, James, on his way. He arrived in the parking lot and got my truck loaded up very carefully and quickly. After the 120 mile trek to Fillmore, I got a call from my brother saying he needed my help at home which is about 40 miles away. I NEEDED my truck to get home! I asked James if there was anyway he could get my truck in running order the same day. He said “let me make a phone call real quick and I’ll get you an answer.” He made a phone call and was able to get the part that my truck needed from the parts store which is closed on Sundays, and got my truck fixed in less than an hour. He made sure all my fluids looked good and sent me on my way. Thanks to Kadi, James, and Sarah I was able to get home to help my brother that’s same day! Kadi and Sarah were super happy to help, and very easy to deal with and James was super kind and very respectful. If you or someone you know needs a tow, Dearden motor is the place to go!!!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: We were happy to help! Glad you had a good experience, thanks for the great review.

reviews.name: K L
reviews.text: What a great staff! Towing our 5th wheel to Yellowstone when our truck broke down near Fillmore, UT. When a local repair shop couldn’t complete the repairs, we called Dearden Tow and had them take our truck to a Chevrolet dealer in Provo. I meet Josh (the driver) at the repair shop to discuss where the truck was going to be towed to. I’d told him that I wouldn’t be going and that I be staying at the local KOA where my 5th wheel was with my family. He told me that he could pickup the 5th wheel and have us all taken to Provo to a campsite of our choosing. I was very appreciative but kindly declined. I felt is was more important to get the truck to the dealer so they can get started on the repairs. Later that day, I get a call from Tony (I presume, Mr Dearden) asking why I didn’t go with Josh to Provo and expressing his concern. After explaining the circumstances of our breakdown, I was able to sense his genuine sincerity and support for well being for my family and offered any support that we needed for my family. Mr Dearden, Josh and the receptionist at Dearden Tow (sorry I forgot her name, who pickup up the phone just before closing) are a great representation of your community and the State of Utah! Thank you.

reviews.name: KimP
reviews.text: James was an absolute lifesaver for my husband and I last Monday! We hit a piece of brake drum that had fallen from a semi-truck on Route 24 about 5 miles west of Hanksville on our motorcycle (rental from Las Vegas), tore a hole in the bottom of the engine, transmission fluid leaking, and wouldn't start back up. We were able to call roadside assistance (thank goodness I had some cell service), they had to call around to find a tow service that would take the job. With 90+ degree heat and 30-40mph winds, we got a ride into Hanksville to get out of the weather. Dearden Towing took on the job, and James started the 3 hour drive to get to us (coming from Fillmore). The person I talked with on the phone at Dearden was great also, she quickly understood the situation, where we were, and how long it would take James to get to us, giving us a pretty accurate ETA. He picked up the motorcycle on the way, then picked us up at Stan's Burger Shack and gas station, and drove us 3.5 hours north to Salt Lake City (nearest place to return motorcycle). And kindly drove us another 6 miles to the rental car place, before finally heading back to Fillmore (in heavy rain and thunder/lightning) - making his drive time for the day at easily 10 hours! He was super nice, pleasant, kind, easy to talk with, and safely drove us through heavy winds and some incoming storms all the way up to SLC. We are so appreciative of James and his kindness! Thank you for rescuing us last Monday - Kim & Paul from Ohio
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Kim and Paul it was quite the adventure. I hope the rest your trip was a little less stressful thanks James D

reviews.name: Jesse Becker
reviews.text:
Saved the day!!!!! Holy smokes, super friendly, fast, the lady on the phone sounds like an absolute sweetheart and a super cool human 🤙

Might run out of gas again here on purpose they were so nice 🤩

Thanks for making sure I didn't move to Utah 🥰

reviews.name: Macori Inc
reviews.text: He saved my semi truck and my weekend in Vegas!! Truck entered the derate mode and i needed a forced regen. The mechanic picked up the phone on Friday at 10pm and stayed working on my truck until 2am! Really amazing!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Macori, we are so grateful for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that we were able to get your semi truck back on the road and keep your weekend in Vegas on track.  Our team is dedicated to providing the best possible service, and we're happy to know that we exceeded your expectations. Thank you again for choosing 24 Hr Auto/Diesel Repair & Towing!

reviews.name: T P
reviews.text: Called this company for roadside service on a Saturday morning and when the person answered the phone it was in a very rude unprofessional way . My husband went on to ask a few questions to be told that they don't do roadside , they aren't open on Saturday and they wouldn't be able to do anything until Monday when they open. I would have assumed they worked on Saturday considering the name is 24 hr service and their add online shows provided services 24/7. When getting all this information on the phone the person was just rude answering questions as if we were bothering him and taking up his time . As a business owner , phone manners and being polite to people will definitely pay off in the long run especially when there are other competing companies out there that have the same services.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Hello. Some services we are limited on right now due to lack of help. I'm sorry if any of the staff was rude . Right now we are only able to provide Semi Truck roadside when our technician is available.  I will definitely get to the bottom of this.  I apologize and thanks for bringing this to our attention.  It should never be like this no matter what.  Normally I am in town to handle calls I was out of town with my daughters softball game.  As you can tell my other reviews are all great.

reviews.name: Kayla Barnes
reviews.text: Don was quick to help us on a Saturday night. Gave us a great estimate over the phone and was super kind and efficient. Would definitely call again if we need towing help. Highly recommend to anyone who may be considering utilizing their services!!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks, Kayla!

reviews.name: Lisa Tran
reviews.text: Fantastic service!! Dons and his nephew are great. They picked up the phone immediately, gave us accurate time estimates, even gave us a ride to our drop off location! Prices were incredibly fair, they definitely deserve a good tip. We’re so grateful!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Lisa, for your business!

reviews.name: S A
reviews.text: Don Shelley answered the phone, was at my business in 20 minutes, tried to fix the issue (of car not coming out of park) himself for a while. He went above and beyond trying to help. Towing it on his modern tow truck with knowledge of how to get the all wheel drive to unlock so he could do it without damaging my transmission. I'm happy with Don Shelley towing, and he came highly recommended by a friend at work. Will call him again, if needed. Thank you!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Sherrie!

reviews.name: Jamie Homewood
reviews.text: Super easy to work with. Helpful over the phone, and accommodating to where I had to take the vehicle. He even went out of his way to park the vehicle in a convenient spot for me. Great job.

reviews.name: Mark Rosenstein
reviews.text: Heading towards Southern California on a Sunday night to deliver a larger shuttle bus, I over heated on I-70 about 40 miles east of Salina.  Mike answered the phone and explained what he could and could not do to help, coming up with a plan to add needed coolant to get me to a shop, if needed.  He was so helpful and kind. Mike went the extra mile for me as it took time to slowly ascend to the pass to keep the bus from overheating again.  He even followed up with me the next day to ask if I and the bus were OK.  I am so thankful for the help I received from him!

reviews.name: JOE RAMIREZ
reviews.text: Would have been nice if they answered their phone.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Sorry, Our phone number on our listing was hacked for about three weeks that’s why we didn’t answer our phone. We would appreciate your business in the future. This shouldn’t be a one star review. We never had the chance to give you any service to get a bad review.

reviews.name: neil spink
reviews.text:
Our fuel pump failed just at mile marker 100 on I70 Westbound.  After calling 911, Johnsons towing was on scene in 90 minutes. Mike got us picked up and on our way to town.

While enroute to Salina, he was on the phone calling all the repair shops. After a couple of calls, Jason at GCR answered and took on the job.

While we were waiting at GCR, Mike called us to make sure we were doing okay. We were doing just fine and GCR has us back on the road in 2.5 hours.

Such an outstanding company with incredible people. Going out of their way to make sure we were safe AND taken good care of. Thank you so much for taking care of us!

reviews.name: Stephen Jordan
reviews.text: My truck broke down and was in need of being towed to the nearest shop. They answered the phone promptly and the truck was hooked up and rolling within an hour. Fast, friendly, helpful, and all at a fair price.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Hi Stephen,

We are happy to help! And I am even happier we could get you squared away for a fair price. If you have any issues in the future, please give us a call.

reviews.name: Chris Bowthorpe
reviews.text: These guys are amazing! We had some car trouble on the freeway. They answered the phone right away, gave clear and fair pricing up front, and showed up in 15 minutes. Honestly saved our vacation and I couldn’t be more grateful!

reviews.name: Everett Vangsnes
reviews.text:
The day before heading to Moab from Portland, I realized I was missing one of the sway bar links on my truck. I bought new parts before making the drive but didn't have a plan for installation once I arrived. I found Moab Mobile Mechanic via Google search and called Matt on a Sunday hoping for a Monday repair time, and it all worked out perfectly.

We spoke once or twice on the phone on Monday, I planned a location to meet, and he showed up right on time, got to work and finished the job quickly.

Matt's chill and professional, and definitely knows the Moab off-roading scene well. He's built some nice rigs over the years and can offer advice on trails if you're curious.

I also recommended my friend to him for an issue with his Gladiator's drive shaft. Same thing: one day's notice, great interaction.

I'll def share his info around to anyone I come across. He's legit & the real deal. 5 stars all day.

reviews.name: E Nash
reviews.text: Matt was awesome to work with. He was responsive on the phone, and showed up early the next morning for our appt. He was polite, and got right to inspecting our vehicle. He explained the issue and the inner workings of the parking brake issue we were having in clear, concise terms and was easy to understand. We would absolutely work with Matt again if we ever have anything come up on future trips to Moab.

reviews.name: Alyssa Strong
reviews.text: Tried to call this guy and get help and was super rude on the phone and wouldn't come out and help, you are a mobile mechanic but can't drive out 20 miles ?
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: You must be speaking of a different mobile mechanic. Because we have never spoke. And I cover a service range of 100 miles surrounding Moab, so I definitely didn't tell you that I couldn't come out 20 miles, unless we were already busy with another customer. This sounds more like an entitlement issue, than a business issue to me. Unless you care to expose when you stayed, and a phone number, I will continue to consider this review irrelevant and spam.

reviews.name: M K
reviews.text:
Here’s the BLUF
1) Will come to where you are
2) Gets the job done
3) Provides options for solutions
4) Outstanding rates
5) Supports Veterans!!!

This review is long overdue here but I’ve already shared my story with my Jeep club buddies in Discord and on Reddit.

When I broke down at a campsite in Moab on a Friday late afternoon, I knew my chances of getting into a shop was zero-to-none-whatsoever.  I still called around and two out of maybe 4 shops I was able to even get phone picked up laughed.  So I asked my Jeep forum and Discord groups for a mechanic and it was almost unanimous that I need to contact Moab Mobile Mechanic.  Matt from Moab Mobile answered and we were able to schedule service.  All I had to do was flip my family’s trip to Arches visit on this trip and next day my Jeep was fixed!

So let me continue story about Matt from others that have not written a review here.  A good family friend, months before my trip, on his family trip across the U.S. broke down at another campground in Moab and because it was an RV, he was striking out on a mechanic til he called Moab Mobile Mechanic.  Matt showed up and fixed his RV and my buddy was on his way to the next destination.  Matt probably didn’t know this but my buddy has stage 3 cancer and no way in shape to be fixing RV in 100F+ weather.  TBH, that trip with his family was their just-in-case trip…
Matt saved their trip and minimized stress.

The cherry on top?  I told him that we were also going out to Elephant Hill backcountry and he offered for me to call him before we headed out and call back when we got back out by certain date/time.  If he hadn’t heard from me by that time, he’d come drive out to the backcountry to fix/recover my Jeep!

I highly recommend Moab Mobile Mechanic!

reviews.name: Sarah Harmon
reviews.text:
Guy who answered the phone was a nightmare. extremely rude and condescending from the moment he picked up the phone . We would recommend West auto instead or maybe even a 5 year old boy would be more helpful :)

Edit: the owner claims that they have a woman answering the phone, yet the person speaking on the voicemail sounds like the same man who answered our call.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Hello Vegan Sarah, you've left a review that doesn't represent services rendered by our company. Especially considering we have a woman answering our phones. Perhaps you meant to bash another local business. Please take the review down so you don't look silly.

reviews.name: Josh VanPutten
reviews.text:
I'll spare the long story, but be very careful having your vehicle brought here.  Cost me over 3,000 miles of driving, countless phone calls, and over a year to get my vehicle back. Only for it needing to be shipped home by a different company.
Poor communication and not a trustworthy operation.

reviews.name: Cindy “Amylou” Weed
reviews.text: They were very helpful! My son was in another state and broke done so I called them up and they were able to send someone out after I got off the phone with them and get my son towed. Highly recommend using them for your towing needs

reviews.name: Dottie Atkinson
reviews.text:
I wanted to share with everyone how awesome and what a great job Andrew from Hansen GMC Towing did for my daughter and two year old granddaughter and myself. My daughter was driving me to the Salt Lake Airport from Pocatello and we broke down about 55 miles away from Salt Lake. Luckily I have AAA so I made the call, but I had no address to give them. I also have a block on my phone that doesn’t let numbers call through if they are not in my contacts. After I made the call we waited about twenty minutes and a tow truck pulled up behind us. Andrew introduced himself to us and said that they had been calling us with no luck because of the block on my phone. Instead of waiting until they got a hold of us Andrew started driving around looking for us and found us. He drove my daughter and her family home. He got me to a gas station so I could get an Uber to the airport. And of course he delivered the vehicle to the shop of my choice! I was crying saying goodbye to my daughter and two year old granddaughter and Andrew was so patient throughout it all. Thank you so very much Andrew for being the person that saved us.

Dottie A
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Dottie, it has been a pleasure serving you. Quality customer service is always our number one priority, and we're happy to hear that Andrew met your expectations. Thank you for choosing Hansen Motor Company, we look forward to having you as a valued customer for many years to come!

Matt Hansen
Matt@hansenmotors.com

reviews.name: Kendi H
reviews.text: Service technician contacted me before I was finished with the phone call with AAA! Very quick service! Andrew was amazing and so very helpful, knowledgeable and fast. Technician was very knowledgeable and took great care of our car. Fantastic experience with Hansen Towing !!! Thank you much for your terrific customer service!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Kendi, Thank you for your very kind review. Andrew and our team strive to make sure that all of our customers leave happy, and it's great to hear about your excellent experience here at Hansen Motor Company.

Matt Hansen
Matt@hansenmotors.com

companies.name: Ladds Towing & Heavy Duty Semi Tow Trucks - Equipment Transport

reviews.name: Brian Leete
reviews.text: Got myself stuck in the snow and called them from the mountain. They came out, and did whatever it took to get the car out of the snow, including some manual shoveling. It was a very tricky removal... it took two trucks to do the job. Even though it took two trucks, they did their best to plan the removal in such a way to minimize the equipment needed -- and keep the cost down. Very friendly. These guys definitely stay in my contact list on my phone.

reviews.name: Kaid Whipple
reviews.text: I can’t say enough praise for this company! Blew a tire half way between St George and Cedar City late Friday night. They picked up the phone right away and sent Mark with a truck big enough for all four of us. Mark was super helpful and tried to help with getting our spare to work but couldn’t get it to hold air so he hauled us into cedar, dropped off the car at the tire shop and took us to our hotel with our luggage. Thanks guys! I love your service, but hope I never have to use you again.

reviews.name: TC Caddell
reviews.text: Amazing kindness, Ladd's towing helped a elderly customer with there vehicle that had a dead battery, the owner was quite confused and told the driver "Austin" she suffered from Alzheimer's, Austin with his personal phone started calling phone numbers she was giving him to find someone to help her, didn't drop her car and leave. He spent personal effort and time to make sure SHE  was taken care of..not just the tow he was assigned.  Austin handled the situation amazingly 👍

reviews.name: Kurt Freeze
reviews.text:
Not enough good words to describe this company and the amazing service they provided.
My family and I were traveling through Utah, towing a large 5th wheel, on our way to a campground in the mountains. This was a special trip for my family and had been planned long in advance.  We had some unrelated difficulties earlier in the day, so our travel had been delayed and it was after 7:00 pm on a Saturday night, which was also a Utah holiday (Pioneer Day), as we were approaching Cedar City, Utah when one of the tires on our truck experienced a failure.
I called multiple repair shops and "emergency service" companies with no answer, apparently since it was on a weekend and after hours. Finally, someone at a truck stop suggested I contact Ladd's Towing, which I did.
Laramy Ladd answered the phone. It was after business hours and he was at a holiday celebration with his family, but he knew we needed help and he left is family and came to assist us. If Laramy had not responded like he did it would have been at least two days before we could have continued our trip. We would have lost our reservations and our trip would have been ruined. Larmay was able to get us back on the road within 3 hours and saved our camping vacation.
This company is amazing!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank You!

reviews.name: Jon Bengard
reviews.text: My 26 ft travel trailer suffered a broken leaf spring just outside of Cedar City Utah on a Sunday. All automotive repair shops were closed and mobile repair didn't answer their phones. Laramie at Ladds towing answered his phone and came to our location immediately. He laid on the hot asphalt in 95 degree weather for 2 hours repairing the broken leaf spring. Laramie went above and beyond and Ladds towing deserves everyones business. I am extremely satisfied with Ladds towing and especially Laramie.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank You!

reviews.name: Kawaiiloa Taulanga
reviews.text: The kind of professionalism these guys showed us today was incredible. The knowledge and timeliness were immaculate. Greatful for their service. We got a flat tire going to dinner, and they responded swiftly. Within 1 hour from our phone call to their show up to changing the flat and we were on our way. Highly recommended. Truly

reviews.name: Ali Ertürk
reviews.text: Enrique was very prompt and quick in restarting my car at 2:00 a.m. Cheaper, faster, and more straightforward than most big companies that charge $200 and require you to spend time filling out paperwork, answer a bunch of questions for a jumpstart or simply don't answer the phone or have long wait times. Enrique even restarted my car a 2nd time at a steep discount after I prematurely turned my car off and the battery died again.

reviews.name: Cameron Scott
reviews.text: Cody Kirkham, with DeWaal Towing is fantastic. My truck lost power at 6:30 am. Calls to two other companies went to voicemail. Cody was friendly and upbeat. Loaded my truck quickly. Even offered to give me a ride to my office several blocks away after dropping off at the mechanic. He is now on my phone as first tow truck to call in the future!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: We appreciate you taking the time to share with us your experience.

reviews.name: Wendy Allan
reviews.text: The way I got talked to on the phone was terrible!! You don’t say to a customer “do you not get what I’m saying” ever worse customer service ever ever. I had another company come take the car off our hands and paid me cash for it!!! Learn how to treat people.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: I’m sorry that we had to repeat ourselves to you multiple times. I could tell you were not listening to us and seemed distracted with someone else. Unfortunately we are very busy and really try to complete our phone calls and get to the next customer quickly. We got to a point that we didn’t feel comfortable towing your car. I’m happy to hear you got it figured out.

reviews.name: Raelyn Schurz
reviews.text: My husband's car broke down on I15 on his way to work at 4am. Of course we start looking up 24 hour towing services and they were the only towing company to call us back immediately and was on location in less than 45 minutes. All of the other companies claimed to be not open yet, even though their website claimed to be open 24 hours. He had our car and my husband home safely before any of the other companies even tried to call us back. They took very good care of our vehicle. I will keep them as a contact in my phone and use them for all of my towing needs in the future and recommend them to my family and friends.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for taking the time to comment. We appreciate your business and glad we could help your husband. Thanks again for sharing.

reviews.name: Andrew Jones
reviews.text:
Cody was great on the phone, fair and helpful.
The only service in the Salt Lake Valley willing to pull me out on a snowy road. Would recommend.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for taking the time to do this. We appreciate this.

reviews.name: LG
reviews.text:
Sons car broke down on the side of the freeway last night. So I googled towing companies for the car is undrivable. Dewaal & Sons was the first company in my search which has high reviews and star rating so I called them first. And I must say I am so glad I did.
The gentlemen I talked to on the phone; I think his name was Cody was very helpful and friendly. He dispatched a driver right away.
Anthony was the gentlemen who arrived and he was very professional, courteous, empathetic and had us on our way in no time.
I highly recommend this company and would use again if I need a tow.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for your comments!

companies.name: The original ROADRUNNER TOWING of Centerville, Bountiful, Farmington, North Salt Lake, West Bountiful, and Woods Cross,Utah

reviews.name: Troy Butcher
reviews.text: I called around to a few towing companies, and these guys were the friendliest, and gave excellent service.  I talked with a couple companies where the people on the phone acted like I was a bother to them.  I will definitely use Roadrunner again if I ever need a tow - and you should do the same!

reviews.name: Paul S
reviews.text: These guys put me in a bad spot and didn't care whatsoever. I vane reccomend them. I had cheduled a tow with them for the next day. The guy on the phone requested I call him again the next day to remind him an hour prior (guess they don't write things down) so I did exactly that. I called the next day they claimed they never talked to me. Funny because the guy on the phone had remembered my car and described it from a previous tow a month or so earlier. I don't think the guy I talked to was the same one but answered the same number and said his truck was broken. I don't know what to say...

reviews.name: Dave Hess
reviews.text: Where do i start? This place towed my car no thanks to the wonderful wendover police. Then they proceeded to lose my keys and had to look for over two hours to find them while i sat in their post-apocalyptic junkyard! When i finally got in my car it was torn through and all my phone chargers and electronics were conveniently missing. These people are criminal. I hope they have to pay to remove this review.

reviews.name: Wayne Backman
reviews.text: They were on the way while I was on the phone with them. Hooked up my truck, moved it to a safe place to turn it around for towing.  Friendly, courteous, service.  Highly recommended.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Customers like you are simply the Best, awesome review. We were very happy to assist.  Tell a Friend , Best advertising out there. Thank you kindly!

reviews.name: Mandy Smith
reviews.text: My roadside assistance program was able to look for tow help for me in my area. Mr Quickpick was chosen for me and I’m so happy the tow driver kept in contact with me, both through text and phone calls. I needed to have the driver store my car at the their lot overnight because the auto-shop I requested was gated up for the night. The driver took my car the next morning to the auto-shop. A few days later I got notice that they won’t charge me for the overnight storage, and I am so thankful for that.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Customers like you are simply the Best, awesome review. We were very happy to assist. Tell a Friend , Best advertising out there. Thank you kindly!

reviews.name: susanna littell
reviews.text: Owen of Mr. Quickpick was a lifesaver, when I was stuck 80 miles west of Salt Lake along I-80!  He was very helpful in providing me the phone numbers to the dealership of my choice, so I could get things ligned up when my car arrived for repair. He also called me to keep me updated on his arrival status, and was very professional and organized. Can't beat this trusted service. I will only use them, from now on!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much for your kind words.  Family business, Bringing Integrity back to Roadside Service. Refer to a friend, Best advertising out there .

reviews.name: Glenna Mahmood
reviews.text: Excellent customer service, very quick to pick up my car. Put # in my phone, will definitely call again if I have any problems!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much, we appreciate you and of course happy to Help any way we can.  Family business bringing Integrity back to Roadside Service. Refer to a friend, Best advertising out there !

reviews.name: Layne Behunin
reviews.text: Look if you're a person that cares about customer relations, these guys are it! I couldn't have had a better experience, considering I was stranded and needed a tow. But the 2 folks that I communicated with on the phone and then came to my rescue really reminded me how good people still exist that genuinely care about helping others. I had called about 6 different tow companies before I found these guys, and let me be honest, if you're a person that cares about doing business with good people, then don't hesitate to call these guys!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for taking the time to write such an awesome review, we appreciate you and your business. Call back anytime.

reviews.name: Jessica Smart
reviews.text: They were quick, responsive and kept me informed. Professional and pleasant communication over the phone and in person. It was a positive experience.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Thank you, Jessica! We appreciate your business and look forward to helping you with any questions or future vehicle needs. Thank you for choosing Hansen Motor Company.

Matt Hansen
Matt@hansenmotors.com

reviews.name: Donna Galles
reviews.text: HANDS DOWN, HANSEN TOWING COMPANY IN BRIGHAM CITY AND BENJAMIN THE TOWING MAN —-FLAT TIRE FIXER MAN —-WAS EXTREMELY PROFESSIONAL AND EFFICIENT!  IN ADDITION, ZANE WHO TAKES CALLS IS SO PROFESSIONAL AND EFFICIENT ON PHONE ORGANIZING EVERYTHING FOR ME .   I WENT THROUGH MY AAA AND GOT HANSON TOWING , WHAT A PEACE OF MIND ESPECIALLY SINCE I WAS STRANDED 4 1/2 HOURS FROM HOME AND I AM 60 YEARS OLD AND I WAS AT THE GOLDEN SPIKE NATIONAL PARK AFTER HOURS ….SO THANK GOODNESS THERE WAS CELL OHOME RECEPTION AND HAMSON TOWING AND ZANE AND BENJAMIN .  I AM SAFE NOW AND HAPPY ONCE AGAIN AND MY TIRE IS LIKE NEW …YIPPEE! UTAH AND ITS PEOPLE HAVE BEEN SO KIND  …IDAHO AND ME THANK YOU SO MUCH ….thanks Donna
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Donna, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We work hard to make sure our guests have an exceptional experience. We will share your comments with our team, and we look forward to working with you again.

Matt Hansen
Matt@hansenmotors.com

reviews.name: Alexis Curley
reviews.text: These guys were fast. Communicated great. If I am ever broke down again I hope Im able to call them. You don't find genuinely kind people very often, and the gentleman I spoke to on the phone and the dtiver were awesome!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Alexis!

reviews.name: Adrian Barriga
reviews.text: Hanson towing is awesome they answered my phone call right away, They sent driver Jess out, real professional And fast they said 25 minutes and they were there in 25 minutes I was able to get my van towed back to my house reloaded another vehicle up and was off to work. Awesome service thank you

reviews.name: Jarel Yantes
reviews.text: I used Hansen Motor Co Towing to tow my 1972 Chevrolet Blazer from a storage unit in Brigham City to my new house in Plain City. I believe the guy that helped me on the phone was Roy and the guy that towed my Blazer was Jesse. These guys made it so easy and it was totally worth the money I spent. My blazer didn't have any brakes, drive-lines, engine, etc. due to it being an ongoing restoration project. Jesse was able to get the Blazer up on the tow truck and took care not to scratch the newly painted axles. He also took highway 89 from Brigham City to Plain City which also helped ease my stress. When he got to my newly built house, Jesse was able to back the tow truck right up to the garage and unload the Blazer right into place in the garage. I was worried the tow truck bed would scratch or damage the concrete driveway, but again Jesse took care and everything went perfect. This Blazer was my dad's before he passed so it also has great sentimental value. Again, I cannot recommend Hansen Motor Co Towing enough. Great guys! Quality service! I would definitely use them again without hesitation. No headache. They made my life so much easier and stress free. Jesse and Roy are both studs and deserve a raise!!!

companies.name: Carrillo Brother's Auto, Semi Repair & Towing 24/7

reviews.name: Christopher Genin
reviews.text: Excellent service. They picked up the phone after hours on a Saturday night when I was stranded in the desert with a flat tire. Got me back on the road again quickly.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you so much! Hope you are enjoying your service.

reviews.name: Lynette Pursell
reviews.text: Had our water pump fail and called late at night, phone was immediately answered. Owner was so kind and promised to repair for us next day. Parts were far away but he organized getting them and ended finding other safety issues which were fixed also. Fair pricing. Excellent service. Worked until 11 pm to get it done on a holiday weekend. These are good people. Highly recommend this business. We were stranded on a 2500 mile move across country with lots of pets. They saved the day. CALL THEM!

reviews.name: Cody Carithers
reviews.text: I got a flat tire on the outside of wendover literally not even five minutes from their shop. When I spoke to them on the phone I was told it was a $75 call out fee. After waiting over an hour I called to see when the service tech would be arriving. I was told the service tech came out already and that they didn’t see me. So once the tech arrived I was not only charged for the one call out fee, I was charged twice because they couldn’t find me although I gave specific instructions on where I was located. Took them five minutes to swap my tire with my spare because my lug wrench was the wrong size. Needless to say, they made out like bandits with $145 for a ten minute swap. I will NEVER use this company again.

reviews.name: Zorintha Relph
reviews.text: My Honda CRV loss power and all warming lights came on about 30 miles away from Wendover. I limped into Wendover only able to go about 40mph. Even though after hours Carillos answered the phone and said come over first thing in the am. The mechanic ran diagnostics and cleared all the warnings. Explain that the gas I bought at lower grade in a small town was probably dirty. Fueled up with 91 octane and all is good. I will now keep fuel cleaner in my car when traveling. Also Best Western right next door to Carrilos was amazing getting my daughter and I a room for the night.

reviews.name: A New Morning View ScottnTina
reviews.text: Omar had multiple things going on. Answer phone calls, 3 customers before me n still had time to stop n see what he could do to help. We are capable of fixing small mechanical issues but the code reader said Turbo issue so we had go to a professional. We used our own tools to replace the gasket for the EGR cooler, but Omar made sure to check in with us n told we are on the right track. I highly recommended stopping in if you are traveling and have any issues for automobiles or diesel. Thank you Omar!

reviews.name: Branson Fonnesbeck
reviews.text: Thu 2/13/25 was a stormy day to be traveling down from Idaho. Our radiator outlet broke spewing coolant everywhere while sending off every alarm light on the dashboard as we pulled off near the ID/UT border. We coordinated with Hansen Towing over the phone and got the car towed into a mechanic in Tremonton when we needed it. They were very accommodating and easy to communicate with. Thank you so much!

reviews.name: Russell Henderson
reviews.text:
If you need help with towing in the Cedar City area   these are the guys you want to help you.  We lost power on our OLD Motorhome coming northbound on I-16 around Pintura.   We tried to get help through the AAA 800 line but they had a hard time realizing we were in our RV...  We called All Ways towing directly and (on Sunday)  logan worked it from his end to link us into AAA and to a live person....after all was said and done AAA,   issued the work order for towing to another towing company.  Before Logan got off the phone with me he suggested that I contact the assigned towing company to make sure they understood where we located and get an estimated ETA...  I did just that, and in the conversation with the other company we learned that that company did not have the right equipment to tow Motorhomes.....  OH NO.... I called Logan back and asked his advise and he said he would help out and contact AAA again and make sure that they knew what equipment needed to be sent to help us....   I was hoping at this point that AAA would send All Ways to our rescue...  They did   YEAH!!   If you have a need towing,  All Ways has the TOOLS...

This company and crew were willing to help us even they might not have received the payday....Logan made sure that the right equipment was sent to our aid, he helped make sure thing were right with AAA etc...Thanks Logan !!!

reviews.name: Keith Sears
reviews.text: I'm a truck driver employed by CR England. I was broke down on the side of the road in Cedar City and dispatch called this company to tow my truck. I got an ETA of 44 min and 4 hours later they didn't show and didn't call. I was told by dispatch that they could not get the company on the phone to get a status update. Now I have to wait another 2-3 hours on the side of the road for another company to come.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
You were lied to buddy. 
Told your dispatch at 1:42 that we were unavailable. 
It was a 15 second conversation. 
You’ll be reported unless you take this down. 
I have the evidence to contest

reviews.name: Mary Doane
reviews.text: I am a 71 year old female that was traveling about 50 miles into a remote area near iron spring road Outside of Cedar City. I was traveling for my job. I got stuck trying to turn around and ended up with my rear tires in a deep ditch. I was scared and extremely upset.  Two young men from All Ways Towing contacted me by phone within 5 minutes.  They calmed me down and walked me through connecting my phone with theirs so they could find me. While in route to my destination they called several time to reassure me help was on the way. When they arrived It took less than 5 minutes to pull me out. They were very professional. I am so thankful that AAA called them. I highly recommend All Ways Towing.    Mary D
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Mary for the kind review. Glad we could help!

reviews.name: Juan Miranda
reviews.text: I accidentally got my car stuck in the salt flats and I was out in 30 minutes. They were very helpful on the phone, giving me advice to get it out before having to come over themselves, as well as in person. If you’re ever in need of a quick and reliable tow, call these guys.

reviews.name: Taylor O’Neal
reviews.text: Literal life savers! Got a flat right outside of  SLC at 4am in 20 degree weather and our jack broke. They were the only one to answer their phone for us and sent someone as quick as they could. We didn’t care how long we had to wait being over an hour away. We were just so glad they could help us.

reviews.name: Brittany Love
reviews.text:
Desperate times call for desperate measures… which is why forking out $600 didn’t seem like too much at the time to get our rental car out of the salt. Steven was straight to the point, asked for our location and pictures to get the mudcat out to us.

It wasn’t till after I gave him the complete card information that he disclosed this transaction is nonrefundable once the phone disconnects and that someone will be out there within 45 minutes. We were trying to work with AAA but they wouldn’t be out for hours, so we agreed and ended the call.

Fortunately, we did get someone out in 43 minutes and were out with no lasting damage to the car. The gentleman who got us out was very kind and helpful, overall it was a good experience minus forking out an expensive car payment for a mistake.

Great business model as there is a demand but geez it’s rough being on the consumer side.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Thank you for your review!  We are happy we got you out!

It may seem like a bit much, but many of our employees have been with us for 20 years and with that comes the wisdom of knowing if or how far out we can take our tow truck onto the salt and when we should drop our equipment.  I've been told another tow company in town had to pay a hefty fine for "damaging a state park" on top of a hefty tow bill when his truck was stuck many years ago (around the tune of $10k each was what I was told).  Someone posted a decent blog about it many years ago on the Salt Flats Racing Association's page: https://saltflats.com/stuck.htm

We will usually attempt to provide some tips and tricks to try to get unstuck (look for some boards or floor mats, let some air out of the tires), Stephen usually relays that information unless it looks like it will be futile (IE buried up to the frame).  It is rare around this time of year to get out once you're caught due to the dampness of the salt, the top crust might seem stable, but I've lost my shoes a few times out there with that thinking.  

Roadside assistance coverage rarely would cover this as most Winch/Extrication policies usually cover a max of 100 feet from paved road.  I believe AAA may only be 10 feet from paved road, but different regions/clubs have different rules and coverages for AAA.  

Thank you again, and should we happen to meet again we hope to do so in a non emergency roadside assistance capacity, but if we do that we maintain the same quality and service that it sounds like you have received!

Sincerely,
Joseph Shaul
Office Manager

reviews.name: Max Brown
reviews.text: Okay, so these guys are awesome. So helpful over the phone and made sure to be calm and reassuring. 100% would recommend in any salt flats emergency.

reviews.name: Bek B
reviews.text: Bad customer service on the phone, not professional at all, barely awake
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Sorry you talked to the owner on the phone and he’s sick and has been for the last few days our dispatcher is currently out of office too which isn’t helping if there is ever anything we can do please let us know and we promise to make it right thanks and have a great day

reviews.name: Owen Sanders
reviews.text: The only guys that answered the phone at 4am. They were eager to help and got us back on the road very quickly. 10/10 on customer service and price.

reviews.name: Breanna Lee
reviews.text: My mom and her friend were stuck in the middle of nowhere, this company said they would go get them and their phone died. They had no charger or anything and they left them stranded there for hours upon hours. I do not recommend this company because if your life depends on it, they’ll leave you stranded.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: We explained to you and you’re mom all you need to do is call you’re insurance back they canceled the call and told us to go back to town I explained this to you and you’re mom before you started swearing and threatening our dispatcher we are more than willing to help have a nice day

reviews.name: Savenaca Druava
reviews.text: If you’re in need of a towing company don’t go to these people. They make up their prices and big time scammers!!. I don’t know why they have a 5 star review!. Also if your car gets towed good luck getting that back. They won’t leave a phone number since they’re different towing company.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: I’m sorry I have no record of towing you’re vehicle. If you give us a call Though I would love to try and make it right great customer service is what we strive for again I apologize and would love to hear from to see how we can resolve this situation

reviews.name: Kenneth Christensen
reviews.text: Contacted El Jefe Towing for a tow. I broke my driveshaft in my truck. Thank God for them Larry was awesome. They were great showed up on time kept me informed and also gave me phone #"s for a couple of people who may have the parts I need. Excellent service, great rates, went above and beyond for me a stranger in need. Well done I can't thank you enough for all of your help. Top shelf if I could I'd rate y'all even better then 5 stars. Thanks again and God Bless.

reviews.name: Kyle Lynch
reviews.text: Called at 8 PM at night about 2 flat tires on a trailer. One phone call and it was handled. Highly Recommended!!

reviews.name: Ziggy Uibel
reviews.text: Bobcat Towing truly deserves 10 out of 5 stars! Chris came to my rescue on Thanksgiving morning when my car battery died about 45 miles down Hole in the Rock Road near Escalante, UT. Despite it being a holiday, Chris arrived earlier than expected, and the service was worth every penny. I highly recommend Bobcat Towing, and feel much safer now that I have their number saved in my phone!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for the positive feed back. We really appreciated the opportunity to help.

reviews.name: Jacob Goretskiy
reviews.text: im am a broker , and we move cars all over us, we had a unit that would not star, and we were recommended to call bobcat towing, I have spoken to Chris and he was there at the site helping us load the vehicle within 30 minutes from my phone call. His prices was great and his promptness is appreciated in business that we do thank you
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks for choosing us and thank you for the feed back.

reviews.name: John Martinezjunco
reviews.text: My mom, MSgt. Michelle Martinezjunco and dad, SSgt Juan Martinezjunco, both retired USAF veterans of over 20 years, were just turned away by this company while stuck in the snow in Duck Creek Village, UT. The driver would not confirm with USAA that they had sufficient coverage to pull them out because they were not within 15ft of the road. He refused to help unless we paid cash at a rate of $160/hour, and said there would be no one else that would do it for us. When I asked him how many hours he wanted to charge us for, he said two hours. $320 to get a truck down a drive way? On top of what USAA was going to give you? You’re a con artist, plain and simple. The man dares to drive around with an American flag painted on his tow truck and leaves two veterans stranded because they didn’t have that much cash on them!  Even dropped f-bombs and SOB’s at my mom while she was trying to give him directions to where we were over the phone. Accused her of giving him the wrong address, even though USAA uses GPS location to send him the address. If you’re in the area and need a tow, use Bryce Canyon Towing. This company was able to get my parents out in in 10 minutes and even offered to drive them to the main exit, SR-14 that was freshly plowed.

reviews.name: Micah Gallion
reviews.text:
This review should be kept short and simple.

You are lying claiming you had something to do with our safe towing. How dare you even lie so blantly? The insurance company literally had to make us wait another 60mins to find a company that had availability so please explain how you played a role in our safe return.

My insurance company did not say we werent willing to comply with COVID restrictions because when we explained what just happened, she actually advised us to make a complaint because she TO said you sounded rude over the phone. Our roadside fee even got reimbursed to us because of your rudeness. And please dont say its my version. That last phone call to you was placed in front of an officer who also agreed you sounded rude.

When you said you couldnt take us, we said OKAY! So why did you continue to say "you were on your way"

I understand your trying to make the company sound good but the truth of the matter is you were dishonest, you were a coward and couldnt even say you changed your mind and you DID NOT HAVE ANYTHING TO DO WITH OUR OUTCOME because after you cancelled she clearly stated that she was having a hard time finding a company. And every towing company was following the same protocols, so how werent we complying with covid protocols. Once you said NO we didnt push the topic.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: We are glad that you were safely transported Micah. Hope you have a better day.

reviews.name: Alec Wodowski
reviews.text: These guys are awesome! Had some issues towing a truck back to my house on a Sunday and within 20 minutes of my initial phone call, a driver showed up and got me picked up. Super reasonable pricing and the driver was so nice and friendly! Use them for sure!
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you for choosing us, Alec! We're glad we could help you out quickly and at a fair price. We appreciate your kind words and hope to assist you again in the future.

reviews.name: Joseph Chambers
reviews.text: My wife and I while traveling to California from va for my moms funeral blew a tire right in the middle of utah.  It was cold and the sun had just gone down so it was dark and we had no idea where we were.  We got on the phone with our insurance company to get a tow and they instructed us that we did not have a tow package which was wrong so we had to look thru google and find a company when we came acoss jacks towing.  I gave him a call and explained our dilemma  and he instructed us that he could be there in 20min which was great.  When he arrived not only did he tow our car to a local tire place but also gave us a ride to the nearest hotel and made sure they had a room for us.  Now i dont know about you but to me thats going beyond the scope of outstanding customer service. So if you are looking for a towing company that will not only tow your vehicle but make sure you are ok in the process. Jacks is your man
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: It was my pleasure.  I hope you reached your destination safely.

reviews.name: Teancum Bush
reviews.text: There I was, stranded, and anything but alone. Accompanied by my wife, 3 children, and 5 puppies I sat in my minivan on the side of the road, praying that if I turned the key one last time the engine would magically roar back to life. But, as you've probably deduced, since I'm reviewing SG3 towing, fate played it's cards against me. After my final unsuccessful attempt to bring my car back to life, I knew I was going to need help. But how? Smoke signals? Flares? Bat signal? No. The answer would scare most millennials to the bone, the answer was picking up the phone. One simple phone call was all it took. Within 50 minutes of that simple act our savior arrived, the truck had room and to spare for my rambunctious family. The only complaint was from my 3-year-old who was disappointed when I refused to let him steal the driver's Gatorade.  Before I knew it, I was back in town and my family and I were safe at the mechanic, soon we were back on our way never to forget our hero SG3.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: We deeply appreciate this amazing review. Thank you for working with Sg3 Towing and Recovery, and for leaving us a 5-star rating! Your feedback and kind words about our towing service means a lot to our team. Please call anytime we can help.

reviews.name: Brianna Smith
reviews.text: I cannot recommend Stauffer's enough! The staff was INCREDIBLY over-the-top helpful. I was looking for a tow for my completely gutted RV to the recyclers and honestly, I was in tears from getting nothing but "no" from so many tow companies. I was feeling helpless when Stauffer's said YES! They not only accommodated for my request but also got to my house within 30 MINUTES of calling, and had my junk RV to the recyclers in LESS THAN AN HOUR! Erin was a joy to talk to over the phone and even had me text photos over to ensure they were sending the right tow truck for the job. She then allowed me to text her so we could coordinate the tow truck's arrival time, which saved me from having to call back. I wish I got the name of the tow truck driver because he was also fantastic. His rate is by the hour but that didn't slow him down one bit! I couldn't believe how fast the service was! Once again, I couldn't recommend this company enough! Thank you, thank you, thank you! The amount of stress they took off my shoulders was worth x5 what the cost actually was.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Thanks Brianna.

reviews.name: Theresa Blair
reviews.text: Was in an accident and they said i could get my personal belongings out at the scene but then took off without letting me and when i called to get them on monday because they are closed on the weekend they told me i would have to pay 211.00 but i am only a crossing guard and it would take me two checks to pay for it so i finally get the money and call back up there and they twll me it will now cost 1054.00 bucks to get my personal belongings and i was signing my car over to them.  My blood pressure cuff is in there and they will not even allow me to get it out.  They dont care about people only money.  I have never had this problem with any other tow company around.  This is the worst place ever and i would not reccomend them to my worst enemy.  And they say they will work with low income people but they are rude on the phone and in person.  They dont work with anyone.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: Theresa can you tell me the employee you talked too?

reviews.name: FRED B
reviews.text: WORST EXPERIENCE I HAVE HAD! MAKE SURE YOU TAKE ANYTHING OF VALUE OUT OF YOUR CAR BEFORE YOU LET THEM TOW IT. LIKE YOUR PHONE, RADIO, TIRES, ENGINE, ETC.

reviews.name: Melissa Pratt
reviews.text: Kwick Towing responded really fast. I feel very confident about the service I received. My phone's battery was about to die, and I needed someone who would respond to my situation quickly.I was able to get my car started and running great. Thank you for all your help. I don't think any other towing place could have been there as fast and reliable as kwick Towing.

reviews.name: tima
reviews.text: Hear me out, open 24/7 but closed. Rude, unprofessional. Whoever I spoke to on the phone.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText: I'm sorry you are upset that our office closes. As it clearly states both on Google and on our office signage, the office is open 9-5 Mon-Fri for picking up your police impounded vehicle. Our towing services are always available 24/7 although not always immediately available depending workload at the moment.

reviews.name: Nicholas Robertson
reviews.text:
This company was promp to answer the phone. Others don't answer or put you on hold, never answering. We had an odd tire, so they were not able to help on a sunday. But I was greatfull for the quick response. I will call them for sure next time.
Nic owner of Caribou log homes llc .

reviews.name: Bill Seward
reviews.text:
Hello.  I would like to recommend Kwik towing based on an experience with Darrick and I had this past Tuesday evening in which the Cedar City Utah police department had him give call me to assist with my vehicle being stuck in the snow.  We talked on the phone of my location and cost it would be to get me unstuck.  He said he would be there in 15 to 20 minutes.  In the meantime 2 strangers drove by and they pushed my car from behind and got the car unstuck and I parked the car parellely along the street in front of the hotel.  While the two gentlemen who pushed me to get me unstuck Darrick showed up and said what's going on on here I thought we had a deal and I would be there within 20 minutes I wish you would have called.  I said I was sorry but thought it was longer than 20 minutes to which I was wrong I just panicked and went with the 2 guys who offered to pushed me. Darrick was
understanding and just asked I call a tow driver to let him no what's going on.   To which I understand.  I was short on cash or funds to get home and could not have another roadside service bill because I had a tire blowout on me earlier that day in Arizona.  To Darrick, the two gentlemen who helped me and to the Cedar City Utah police department I wanted to thank them in some way and was truly blessed with unbelievable hospitality.  thank you

NEVER WILL EVER USE THEIR SERVICES EVER!! Mark my words they won’t have anyone using their services ever they will be losing customers before they know it!!

reviews.name: Nathan Martinez
reviews.text: I used freedom towing twice now. They actually answer the phone and give them your location for the tow, and bam there they are already hooking your ride up. DEFINITELY THATS FREEDOM. Oh yeah the price is very affordable and it makes cents as well. So get your towing from freedom towing and experience true freedom, IAM FREE.

reviews.text: These guys are great. They were very fast very professional and very fair. I needed a van towed from St. George to Salt lake and they got it taken care of with one phone call.

reviews.name: Lily S
reviews.text: I went with this company based off on their reviews. I had to jump start my car yesterday (06/17/24); service only took 2 minutes and minimum work. The guy told me it’s $91 and I said “91? for that?” and he replied “okay I’ll go down to $75 that’s the lowest I can go” I didn’t know the price was negotiable! today I have to tow my car to an auto repair shop and the price I paid yesterday is the same price im paying to tow smh I just got scammed by this company but the person who answered the phone and assisted me was very nice. Hope this’ll help anyone.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
I was the one that spoke to you on the phone, thank you for the kind words. I hope you reconsider this review,  while the tow operator was only there a few a minutes,  the entire service  call took just under 1 hour, from the time he left his home and family after hours, to help get your car started, till he returned home. He waived the after hours fee because he could tell you were upset (operator gets 100% of that).  All mechanic shops, or anyone in the service industry charges more per hour than we charge. 
I sincerely hope that this review gets changed to something fair, as we responded and arrived in 20 minutes after 7pm.

reviews.name: Troy Spencer
